Author: Jessica D.
Title: Doesnt blend
Body: I bought this blender to replace my Hamilton Beach blender that I had for over 10 years. I chose this model for the price n that it can crush ice. This product cannot even blend fruit let alone ice. It has these dull, little blades that I was skeptical of. I decided to give it a chance and what a shame. Im confused because this blender had great reviews.

Author: Jeanae Torres
Title: Has a hard time with large ice chunks
Body: Otherwise consistent

Author: Cat Mom
Title: Makes Great Smoothies!
Body: I love the way this makes smoothies so smooth! Only thing is, remove the black top before pouring it out! The top popped off when trying to pour it into my glass.

Author: Elizabeth
Title: Quick and Powerful
Body: I was surprised at how quickly and completely my smoothie mixed and the ice was crushed completely. I was used to other blenders leaving some small chunks, but not so with this one. I am very pleased.

Author: crystal farr
Title: Nice.
Body: I love it

Author: c.holman
Title: Pleased with my purchase!
Body: The 4 star rating is only because I find it very difficult to put the top on completely but this does not stop me from using this appliance at all on every setting. It is not excessively noisy and I have never had noiseless blender. It is attractive and I would buy it again if needed, but hopefully that will not be for a long time. I use it for smoothies and crushing frozen fruit everyday and so far so good....

Author: Rulouie2
Title: Works as described
Body: Replaced very old blender with this item. Doesn’t seem to have as many settings as the old one but works well.

Author: Jeanne Cotter
Title: It Works Great for Protein Shakes
Body: I've gone through a couple blenders that can't hold up to crushing ice for protein shakes. This one so far is working great. I like a thicker shake and most blenders require more liquid to blend the ice, but this one is doing a great job for me.

Author: Elicia Buiveon
Title: Nice
Body: Just one problem, after continuously using the lid come up

Author: Heather Ward
Title: Not 14 settings only 8
Body: I haven't used it yet. But out of the box it is not the 14 settings it says in the description. There are only 8 settings as the high and low are only for high or low pulse. You can't put it on high or low then get additional settings out of it. There's only one speed setting for all the blending options. I haven't used it yet so I don't know what it is as it doesn't tell you anywhere in the user manual.

Author: Susan Hanenberg
Title: i love my blender
Body: nothing

Author: J.A.
Title: Not the best
Body: I have only used the blender a couple of times to make smoothies. My fault the first time, I didn’t use a good setting. Second time tried a higher setting, still larger chucks of fruit than I like. It also stands very tall with the lid on. Wish my old blender hadn’t quit! Disappointed!

Author: LA
Title: Best Blender
Body: This is the perfect blender for protein shakes. It's quite powerful. For the money there is no better purchase!

Author: Lisette
Title: Worked less than 6 months
Body: Plastic piece at base responsible for spinning action worn down. It cannot grip the blade attachment to spin any longer.

Author: Tanner
Title: Awesome!
Body: Great blender for the price!

Author: Nkunde
Title: Broken bottom
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   Received the product and a little piece of it was broken

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Terrible, too loud
Body: This machine cannot even get the basic job done and is very loud. Not worth buying.

Author: Brandon
Title: Met expectations
Body: I have only used this to make smoothies. But it blends well and is super easy to clean out.

Author: Brandon Eddy
Title: Disappointed
Body: Got this blender because I didn’t want to spend $100 on nicer one. Big mistake. This blender isn’t very powerful and doesn’t even break up ice well. Wish I could get my money back.

Author: Alex Rivas Rodriguez
Title: Great Blender for the cost!
Body: I got this blender for my in-law suite, and using it has been great. The blender gets the job done and has so many functions. I haven't had any issues with it and use it practically daily. Definitely worth it!

Author: The Real Sugah Pie
Title: Blender to love
Body: I love everything about this blender!!! ❤️ You will be happy you made the purchase

Author: nicole bonnivier
Title: Doesn’t blend at all!
Body: First and second try on this blender lightly packed, frozen fruit, spinach water no ice would not blend at all. Had to run with machine open smashing down food into the blade. What a pointless machine they had one job.

Author: roberta j. walters
Title: Happt
Body: Good for ice

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Damage
Body: Damage on arrival

Author: Serena
Title: If you like lid wrestling.
Body: I had to replace by very old blender and I wanted a nice one. It really is nice until you try to use it.As a senior citizen, I can barely, with lots of effort, get the lid off the top. For that reason, the potential pleasure of using it, is diminished. The amount of effort is not worth having it. I would not buy it again just for that reason. Otherwise I would be lovin' it!The design of the lid is also a problem. I like to make frozen drinks and smoothies. But the 2 spouts on the top are near useless. The actual openings is too far from the edge so what you are pouring makes a mess because how far it has to go to get out of the blender and into the glass you want to put into. So I have to take the top off to pour directly from the blender.I will just deal with it. Too much trouble to return.

Author: janet boutelle
Title: Works ok
Body: I wanted this to make smoothies. I feel like there is a lot of stopping stirring and starting needed. I had hoped for better

Author: Greg
Title: DOES NOT LIQUIFY
Body: Extremely weak to say the least. Doesn’t come close to liquifying a lemon or anything aside from very soft fruit and even then leaves pulp. DONT WASTE YOUR $39

Author: Gerard T. Lee
Title: It's a good blender, but ...
Body: I purchased this unit mainly to mix my diet food. One of the things in my diet is a soft serve so the recipe calls for ice and water. This blender does a pretty poor job of chopping up ice; at least at the quantities called for by the recipe. I should try using more ice and making larger quantities but for now it's a good blender but a middling chopper of ice.

Author: MessyHairOpenAir
Title: Hold cover on.
Body: It’s works good but it’s not heavy duty. We’ve had it for a couple weeks. It smelled over worked “smoky smell” after a couple uses. Haven’t smelt it for about a week now & we use it daily. We only use it for fruit smoothies. The price was reasonable. We’re still okay with it. We have to hold the cover on or it comes off.

Author: darryl
Title: i loved this blender for just over two months until the plug melted
Body: this blender did crush ice well and allowed me to make perfect amount for two smoothies each time but plug melted 65 days after i received it so despite all of the things i loved about it, it's hard to recommend.

Author: Mrs. Book Nerd
Title: Love! Buying another one!
Body: It has glass and actually works on ice.I use it 1-3x/day and it’s great at everything from making oatmeal flour to smoothing with frozen strawberries.The lid is hard to get off BUT I’d not put it on all the way. I use it like a cover and hold it down with my hand.It’s very easy to clean, I don’t even use soap.My old Hamilton blend’s glass beaker fits perfectly- so now I have a spare!CON:1) The old one used to stop swirling for a second so everything could fall back down to the blades. I can mimic that by holding the pulses halfway down and then releasing the buttons- so it pulses full time, stops when I release button, then resumes full time when I press it down again halfway.But I can’t do that on any of the other buttons like mix or smoothie.3) salsa is a lie! It makes veggie slush in a disgusting pool of water. It doesn’t chop at all. In fact all the buttons are a slow to fast full blend.

Author: Vic
Title: Blender doesn’t work by itself
Body: I got this blender because of the good reviews, but I am extremely disappointed.Yesterday I got to use this blender for the first time. I was getting the food ready for my baby’s 1st birthday. I tried to mix berries, and I had to stop it frequently and mix with a spoon to “help” the blender to crush the fruits (they were not frozen and still was struggling!!!). Then I tried to blend oats so I could make oat flour, and OMG, I had to stop thousand times and still didn’t get the oats 100% blended. I had to do little by little to be able to get some flour. The only thing that was mixed “better” but incredibly took longer than the other cheaper blenders I’ve had was the eggs with oil and milk. Can you imagine? Struggling this much with a blender. I was so tired with all the preparation and still had to deal with something that should help me, not complicate my life… very very disappointed.

Author: The blender literally stopped working and i haven’t even had it that long!!! Waste of money
Title: Doesn’t work anymore
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   Literally stoped working out of no where

Author: Lanin D. Thomasma (lanindt@juno.com)
Title: It's quieter and makes the finest frappes ever!
Body: I bought this blender basically on the power of the reviews, which touted its ability to grind ice. I own a small expresso shop, and have had the same blender for nearly 12 years. My old blender began chewing through coupler teeth over the past year, so I looked for a newer model.This Hamilton Beach blender has a wide base into which the pitcher fits snugly, thus reducing the chance of stripping the couplers.It makes frappes which are beautifully smooth and tasty. And IT IS HELLA QUIET! The glass pitcher makes it much quieter than my previous plastic blender.Just a note: I tried to order a second pitcher at the same time, but this model is too new for Amazon to have them. There are several Amazon dealers who claim that their parts fit this model, but they do NOT. Do not believe them. I had to order the parts assembly directly from Hamilton Beach.

Author: maria
Title: Great
Body: Love it

Author: AvatarBender
Title: Handy
Body: I had been without a blender for awhile and this blender fulfills my needs with so many different recipes.

Author: Todric
Title: Beware of the lid
Body: It’s an okay Blender, but you have any difficulty with your hands (like arthritis or neuropathy) you will struggle with getting the lid off. Glad it fits securely, but rarely put it on as it should be because it’s nearly impossible to remove!

Author: Colleen Flynn
Title: Wonky lid
Body: I purchased. Assembled it. Lid WOULD NOT stay put even though photos of it clearly showed it tight. Kept rising up and would not stay closed, so I repackaged and returned it. Ordered again and same thing. Lid will not stay down. Kept this one with hopes that it will get better with use. Who knows? Seems to work fine.

Author: Nicholas
Title: I think it was used…
Body: The product came and has a bunch of scratches on it. Was this thing previously used? The packaging didn’t seem like it was the original packaging.

Author: Suzanne sege
Title: This blender does not blend anything
Body: Beyond disappointed. None of the features do a thing.

Author: anthony
Title: power very weak
Body: This is the worst product I've ever purchased on Amazon. I'm not sure if it's even working properly because it never seems to puree/liquify foods effectively. Wish I could return the item

Author: Cat Whisperer
Title: Disappointing
Body: Replaced a blender I have used for years. Works OK but It is a cheap plastic device that will need to be replaced in a few years.

Author: Sunques
Title: Works Efficiently and Fast
Body: The best brand of Citrulline I've had so far, and I've had plenty of brands. The blood flow, warmth, and pump is noticeable. Also works in the bedroom!

Author: Rebecca
Title: Works great
Body: Bought this to start making my own juices and smoothies trying to lead a healthier life style. This product was easy to assemble and use. Works amazing super happy with it already made my juice for the morning and made a smoothie. Easy to clean and store!!

Author: Joy Ferrell
Title: excellent, except one flaw
Body: The power is outstanding. The only complaint I have is that my lid doesn't fit snuggly. It just pops right back up unless I hold it tightly in place.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Glass jar, perfect size, grinds smooth
Body: Pros:Glass jar.Blends better than Ninja. All chutneys come out nice, not grainy like NinjaNot bulky. I dont need to have large quantities to grind like Ninja.Does watan or gravy for curries in perfect consistency without needing lot of waterCons:None so far

Author: Patricia johnson
Title: WORK VERY WELL
Body: Nothing

Author: V. Garza
Title: Leaves huge chunks
Body: I’m sorry I didn’t use it right away so I could have returned it, this just doesn’t blend. I’ve tried it 4 times and it does have enough liquid but it leaves everything in chunks. I tried a tomatillo salsa, a chutney, a regular salsa and a blended soup. I’ve tried all settings. Just bizarre to me that it leaves everything practically how I put it in. I have a vita mix thank goodness but I bought this bc it was lighter and smaller. Oh well

Author: chris
Title: Dis functional
Body: It’s a cheap dis functional product, do not buy. Spending a little more for a better product is worth it. I just got it and used it 3 times. every single time I used it, as soon as I pulled the blender out of the unit to pour a drink, the bottom of the blender fell off and poured out the entire drink all over the place. I’ve spent most of my day cleaning up a huge mess multiple times and now have to call carpet cleaners to come clean my carpet.

Author: delio
Title: Buen produrto
Body: Lo mande para cuba muy bueno gracia

Author: Ro P.
Title: Purchase another brand/blender
Body: DO NOT PURCHASE. We've owned this blender for almost a month and it has brought lots of frustration. This blender does not perform as described. It's terrible with ice and just as bad with frozen fruit. It takes about 10 minutes to make a smoothie with frozen fruit. It's not good for making milkshakes either. Semi-soft ice cream blends easily in most blenders - NOT this one. Spend a little extra to get a blender that's worth it!

Author: Colin L.
Title: Doesn't crush ice at all.
Body: Doesn't do what it advertises. Even on the max speed it did not crush the ice like it claims. Waste of money.

Author: Oscar Meow
Title: Terrible!
Body: This blender pushes everything to the side and always leaves chunks of ice, fruit or whatever else you are blending. And it's loud. I am throwing this away and getting a ninja.

Author: Srahm
Title: Very sturdy
Body: Very good quality material. Powerful. Easy to clean.

Author: Shamoya
Title: Powerful
Body: This blender is so powerful in no time it wips the fruits into pieces.

Author: Kimberly Ann Craige
Title: Wonderfully blends!
Body: This blender is simple to use and clean. I use it for making soups and smoothies almost daily. This is the type of sturdy kitchen equipment that I expect to last a long time, even with heavy use. It blends veggies, ice, and fruits quickly and evenly. I like its simplicity because I really just wanted a regular blender with extra attachments — this is it!

Author: Lina Melendez
Title: Blender that doesn’t blend
Body: Worst blender ever purchased. Will not blend anything for the life of it. Tried making smoothies and always leaves large pieces of fruit. How about trying to purée a cooked/soft and cut up squash for a soup? - also not happening. Gives off a smell like it is smoking when being used . Purchased it a while ago and have only used it three times because it is always a disappointment. I will use my Nutribulket in small batches to get the job done. Complete waste of money.

Author: Manthan
Title: Not as good as described
Body: Not so good

Author: Mimi h
Title: Wont crush ice
Body: The description said it crushed ice, it doesn’t. I returned it.

Author: Chris S.
Title: Too many problems
Body: This blender will force liquid out the top pouring lip when you are blending and it is full. It makes a mess. Also the top pouring lip is set back away from the edge which makes a mess when you go to pour anything. It’s difficult to put the top on. Most of the “stainless steel” appearance is made from stickers. It’s hard to clean the top because of the pour spout and vent which both leak and collect fluid. I could not recommend this blender.

Author: Base
Title: This is the one to get!
Body: I've had all the bullet/ningas and they never last. This thing has a huge capacity and power to crush all!

Author: Aja
Title: Gets the job done well
Body: Reasonably priced. Works great.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Horrible don’t buy it
Body: Didn’t blend as it needed to be, box came broken.

Author: Morgan
Title: Great little blender!
Body: Glad I went with this one. Makes smoothies very quickly.

Author: Angela
Title: Con el segundo uso dejó de funcionar pésimo
Body: Pésimo

Author: Wantagh, NY
Title: Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Blender
Body: Nice product. Very happy I purchased this blender. The container is glass which makes it somewhat heavy but is much nicer than plastic. It is easy to clean. I would recommend this product.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Blends great, pour is a disaster
Body: All in all, it’s not the worst blender. It blends efficiently, and without a super a lot of noise, but whoever designed the pourspout should probably rethink their job. Made a mess on my counter every single time, no matter how slow I poured. Might be different for straight up liquid, but I use it for smoothies in the morning and the tiny little pour spout is basically a decoration. Returned it after a week

Author: Mary
Title: Excellent product!
Body: Use this daily for power drinks. Does great job crushing ice! The wave action really makes for even blending.

Author: Gerry S.
Title: very durable blending vessel
Body: We had the same blender for many years and we used it often at the bar for ice crushing and drink mixing. During recent rain storm the previous blender was in a bucket near the edge of the cabana and it filled with water which ruined the motor. So we went online and found this which is exactly what we had, when it arrived we where happy to find the previous vessel fit perfect and now we have double the capacity. Blender is strong and runs well. We replaced our previous with the same one, that should tell you all you need to know.

Author: jose saenz
Title: Pass on this 1
Body: Does not work very well

Author: YAAS
Title: Smoking pieces rumbling
Body: I've used this Blender less than a handful of times and while chopping melons it began smoking and the pieces rolling around inside afterwards was the indicator that it has burned out. Unfortunately I don't recommend buying this Blender

Author: terri rupert
Title: What is up with the lid
Body: This product is just ok at crushing Ice.The lid, however, is ridiculous.. it’s cheap plastic that is a bi#*$ to put on & off.When you do get it on, it still leaks from around the lid when you pour from the spout. I should return this item based on the lid quality alone.

Author: Taylor
Title: Great for smoothies
Body: Have only used for smoothies so far, but love how fast it blends the frozen fruit. Also pretty quiet, big plus for my toddler who loves smoothies but hated the sound of our previous blender.

Author: Dan R. Merrill
Title: Not
Body: you have to push everything constantly into blender

Author: rusty
Title: Motor burned out after 30 seconds
Body: Motor burned out after 30 seconds

Author: Soula Vir
Title: Great
Body: Great priced and great blender!!

Author: Arty
Title: Leaks
Body: Scheduled this for return; the lit doesn't seal well but I could life with that; I don't usually fill up the jar. It doesn't sruch ice well enough for shakes; leaves big chunks no matter now long you process it. I could live with that, reluctantly. But when I pour out the liquid it leaks from the bottom, no matter how tight. The gasket is hard plastic and siimply doesnt seal properly. Might I could futz with it and get it to seal, but I'm not going to deal with having to test it every time I wash it out.

Author: Swaggs
Title: works great
Body: It does the job as expected. Product is a little lighter in weight than I expected but otherwise it's fine for smoothies and easy to clean.

Author: Jay W.
Title: Makes smoothies but gotta use enough fluid.
Body: Came as expected.I've made 2 sets of smoothies with frozen fruits and milk. Least I tried to make them lol. If frothy is the texture of a smoothie still froze but mushy then I did it right. I put in a bag of mixed fruit and a cup of milk and tried pulsing and turned the blender up as high as it'd go and it stopped sucking the fruit down to the blades. User error. Machine works as it should. After I put in a little bit more milk or fluid it took to tearing up the frozen fruits. It does what it is supposed to. I've cleaned the blades and jar in the dishwasher and just by adding water to the blender and cleaning it by blending the water and redoing it couple times then it is clean like it never was used. Quality product. Would recommend to anyone who wants a good blender.

Author: AM
Title: Waste of $$
Body: I liked this blender the first two uses. Once I hit the third use, ice would not longer blend nor would frozen fruit. It also smells like it’s burning. I expected more due to the price of this blender

Author: Michael t scullark
Title: It worked for 30 seconds, started smelling like burnt wiring and quit. My whole order is ruined
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   It burnt out after 30 seconds and ruined my whole order. My bag of sea moss is ruined cause now I can't blend it.

Author: Brittany
Title: Broke in less than 2 months
Body: It’s a decent blender, but it died before we even had it 2 months.

Author: Alesha954
Title: Perfect
Body: Love the blender worth every buck

Author: Tee Gilberti
Title: Does not crush ice as it says
Body: It’s a good product for blending, easy to clean, noise is like a normal blender not quieter at all. It doesn’t crush ice at all so for that I’m giving it 4 stars

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Broke within 1 Month
Body: Absolutely terrible blending quality; only worked for one month, then instantly fried out. Would give 0 starts if possible.

Author: Maryann Cucchiara
Title: Imploded
Body: Tipis hard to put on securely and when I removed the glass jar from base the bottom came off and spilled all over. What a mess!!! Liquid got into machinery!! Not safe. Will return. Imagine if it were hot soup!!!

Author: SzyMo
Title: Works well
Body: Works well enough, yet don’t try to make cabbage juice with it.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Doesn’t chop ice as advertised!
Body: Got this to do normal blender functions and chop ice for frozen drinks. Absolutely horrendous at chopping ice!

Author: Peggy Sue
Title: does it blend well
Body: The title makes it seem like it really mixes well. It dosent mix well at all! It just moves the contents around but dosent blend it. It makes different noises for the variety of buttons but dosent do anything different. It is a disappointment and wound up having to buy another one. What a waste of money!

Author: Jenny
Title: So easy to use and clean
Body: I really love this blender! My previous blender had lots of pieces and was a nightmare to keep clean.This one only had 2 parts which makes it easy to use and clean.It has multiple settings and isn't OBNOXIOUSLY loud like some other blenders.

Author: aries
Title: Excellent job it does
Body: Nice and heavy duty

Author: Está excelente,me encantó
Title: Me gustó es muy bonita
Body: Buen tamaño

Author: Tiwi
Title: love it
Body: surprisingly very quiet and easy to clean.

Author: Ephisa
Title: listen to the reviews
Body: while this blender is very strong, powerful, and not really noisy, IT IS SO LEAKY. The first time I used it the bottom of the jar fell out. my smoothie went EVERYWHERE. I figured it was just user error, so I just tried it again. Once i screwed the bottom on very tightly, IT STILL WAS LEAKING. Absolutely terrible, never again.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Great blender
Body: Great blender. I’ve had it for a few months now and nothing has gone wrong with it. I highly recommend.

Author: Jennifer Galarza
Title: Amazing
Body: It just does everything you could want!! Easy to clean a very powerful!!! A definite good buy!!!

Author: Heather W
Title: Great product!
Body: Product works very well. It's less noisier than other blenders I had. Overall I say it is very good.

Author: LAVERNE
Title: Blends Well
Body: The design is excellent for perfect blending.

Author: Carly Sparrow
Title: Lid is terrible
Body: Great blender, does the job. Super difficult to get the lid off.

Author: jason eddings
Title: Foam party, not needed!
Body: If you like foam this is the blender for you. It add so much air into anything I am making. I have had the gastric sleeve surgery, and wanted to use this for my protein. No mater what setting I use it creates foam, and more than doubles the amount of liquid with air creating foam that is to thick to hold down and get the appropriate of protein I need in a day... truly a disappointment!!!!

Author: L. Boggs
Title: Perfect blender for ice crunchers!
Body: I just moved into my first apartment, needed a blender, and picked this one out. This blender works so much better than I expected!I specially wanted one that could handle grinding ice. For background, I’m a huge ice cruncher and I wanted something similar to shaved ice/snow cone consistency to help my teeth. I use this several times a week just blending up ice and it’s totally blown me away.The size is absolutely perfect for a single person so you don’t make massive portions. The sound level is normal; sounds like a normal blender. Highly recommend!!

Author: Jason R
Title: A great mixer but a terrible blender…
Body: If you are looking for something to stir a drink this is perfect. For me, in over ten uses, it never once liquified a frozen banana…. If you have anything frozen consider more wattage.

Author: Hopdog2
Title: Affordable
Body: Great value blender When you’re on a budget! Would buy again

Author: Justin Jones
Title: Burnt out on first use.
Body: This is a hunk of junk.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: It's not even good at stirring.
Body: Useless. The blades barely stick up past where the bottom flares out. They don't even stir 2 liquids together very well. Any vegetable you drop in gets a little circular groove cut in it, but then it just blocks the blades from doing anything else.

Author: Beverly Davis
Title: Blender
Body: It's Ok, it's doesn't chop ice, like it says.

Author: Sean
Title: really great
Body: as advertised

Author: Daniel
Title: Stopped working
Body: Return

Author: susan
Title: Blender
Body: Sleek and powerful!

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Terrible Blender
Body: I used it only 4 times during the last one and half month since I bought it and it broke. It seems that I was sent an already broken or used product. Very disappointed!

Author: E. Allen
Title: Motor Odor!
Body: I used it the same day I received it. Making a smoothie, I noticed somewhat of a “fishy” odor. I had actually taken some fish out to thaw, so I thought that was it. The next time I used it, same odor. So I started looking inside of my pantry for a bad food product. My wife smelled around and said, it’s that blender!! Worked great, but I had to return it because it didn’t smell right when the motor ran.

Author: sharon
Title: Great blender
Body: I’ve been on a malt kick! And this works perfect, even has a milkshake button. I’ve used it every day since I got it.i it Great purchase

Author: Pat Thomas
Title: Poor Quality
Body: When my wife opened the box for the processor, we. Immediately found that lid of the processor would not secure to the glass container. We immediately placed the processor back in the box and returned it.

Author: Wong F.
Title: Cover is very tight
Body: Be aware that the lid is very hard to pull off. It overlaps the edge and is such a tight fit that my wife cannot pull it off. I had a hard time myself and pulled so hard I was afraid of spilling the contents.

Author: Dixie
Title: Plastic parts
Body: I didn't try it because there were too many plastic parts, I did not think it would last.

Author: Hec
Title: Love it.
Body: Really easy to clean, good quality product.

Author: rd
Title: Cheaply made
Body: I just unpackaged the blender. Not only does the unit have a cheap feel to it, the lid doesn’t even fit. It pops off. I’m returning this.

Author: Rita
Title: Perfect
Body: I love a good blender. This one is that

Author: JOSEPH DAZZO
Title: Perfect
Body: Does a good job and well made

Author: merrybrook
Title: Attractive countertop addition
Body: Substantial base with sturdy glass cup. Wish it had a slower speed for better success in creating emulsions (mayonnaise, etc). Quite loud, but very easy to clean. Does not appear to walk like lighter products do.

Author: lollipops 19
Title: worse blender ever
Body: I wish I had wirtten this and returned this blender- it is the worst blender I have ever owned and used- you can not make a smoothie- as simple as a banana and it still is chunky- I curse it everytime i use it! worse blender ever!

Author: Tracy
Title: Sucks
Body: This product is not worth it at all. Takes forever to blend simple things and broke after 6 months. Just pay the money and get a quality one from Ninja.

Author: Lisa Janey
Title: Bad blender
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   I disliked that the lid was scratched up when I purchased this item new. Also, the blender sounded like it was about to break just blending air. My 4 year old blender doesn't even sound like this. Do yourself a favor and purchase a different blender. Don't waste your money or time returning this thing.

Author: Samantha Lamm
Title: Love my blendwr
Body: I've used many different blenders but u have to say by far the best I've used

Author: Marion
Title: Very disappointed !
Body: I bought this blender 1 month 1/2 ago. The plastic wheel of the motor is very damaged after using it only few times. It smells like fire. I am very disappointed and I feel I won’t be able to use it for a long time…

Author: Kay Rich
Title: Piece of crap!!
Body: I can’t even get to mix ice cream with liquid. So I doubt it can even attempt to crush ice.

Author: Lydia
Title: Crappy blender
Body: Bought this to make smoothies and it didn’t blend up the ice properly. Even when I took the ice out, it still didn’t blend right. But it’s cheap so I guess you get what you pay for…

Author: Amanda Zehringer
Title: Mixed results
Body: Just bought this blender. It was advertised as a smoothie blender. It did well with the berries and even the frozen banana but failed with nuts.One of my favorite smoothies is banana and blueberry. I add a handful of almonds to get some protein. The blueberries were fresh, the banana was frozen. It mixed them okay, but there were still noticeable large chunks of almonds in the mix, even after blending for a couple minutes. Chunks were 1/8 to 1/4 inch.My old blender was a Hamilton Beach and it lasted 25 years so I bought another by the same company. Old blender mixed nuts just fine down to micro particles. Noticed a design differences between the two. Old one had a narrower base. Blades almost touched the sides. New one had a wider base and the mixing blades were about 1/2 inch from the sides. This allowed the nuts to be pulled down to the blades but not actually get cut by the blades.Overall disappointed but the blender is still functional. Good thing I like chunky smoothies

Author: Deidre Carroll
Title: Great gift
Body: I bought this for my 19 year old son, he goes to gym every day and drinks protein shakes. When I gave him the blender he said it blends great crushes ice

Author: fruitloop
Title: High Performance Without the High Price!
Body: I bought this model because our blender - also a Hamilton Beach, by the way - got broken during a recent move. The model it replaced was over 20 years old, which should tell you something. I’ve used Kitchenaids, Cuisinarts and the so-popular Ninjas. Give me a good ol’ Hamilton Beach instead! Their blenders blend, puree, crush, mix and just plain kill it better than any other model! You get the high performance without the high price tag! Crushing ice is fast and easy, mixing cocktails is a breeze. It’s easy to clean - I just pop the parts in my dishwasher, light and easy to store. I’ve sliced my fingers twice on my sister’s so-trendy Ninja, but my Hamilton Beach is fast and quick to assemble and disassemble. Save your money, buy Hamilton Beach’s budget-friendly, reliable blender instead of the pricey (so-called) “high end” brands, and use your savings on a nice bottle of tequila or a pretty set of margarita glasses.

Author: Walid
Title: Powerful
Body: Top Quality product, easily as good as a Ninja!

Author: To_la_ni
Title: Love
Body: Itttttttt

Author: Briana
Title: Do not recommend
Body: I bought this for my Daily Harvest smoothies every morning and it just doesn't work well. The blades are so short and small it only blends the ingredients at the bottle middle, even after pulsing multiple times. I end up having to shake the entire blender violently to get it to blend everything. Even with that it doesn't fully blend and so it's so thick it's difficult to pour. Looks like there is a different blade attachment in the instructions that might help but I haven't been able to find it yet. I'd like to say you get what you pay for but its not even worth the $40 I paid because it just adds anger and frustration to my morning routine. Just spring for the extra money and get something that does the job.

Author: M Gingell
Title: Good sturdy blender
Body: I wore out my previous Oster blender (with a plastic blender container) with too much ice crushing and smoothie making. So I did some research and found this one highly recommended by an outside reviewer. After reading about it I gave it a try. Really happy with it, especially the glass container. We also found some blenders with glass containers at Walmart but they were larger (and I'm guessing heavier). This one is the perfect size for me to lift (older woman, some arthritis in hands), and the size is sufficient for our two-person household. Ground up my ice-based smoothie perfectly today. Followed the instructions carefully - adding the liquid first and then the ice cubes. I think I did that wrong with my old blender, which hastened its demise.This blender is also very easy to clean. There was a complaint from another purchaser about the top being too difficult for his wife to remove so I was a little worried about that, and the top does fit very tightly, but I figured out how to ease it off without too much discomfort.If you're looking to spend around $40-50 for a blender this is a very nice one.I read

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Part broken after 2 weeks!
Body: This blender was received 2 weeks ago and it has stopped working. Checks revealed that a part on the inside is broken. How can that be? Total waste of money! Had to pay for purchase as well as delivery out of the US.

Author: Lynn
Title: Nice Blender
Body: This is a nice blender with multiple speeds and low noise. Works just fine for crushing ice, making smoothies and other frozen drinks. The pour spout on the blender bottle is a bonus.

Author: Rosa
Title: So disappointed the Blender
Body: My mistake - I wanted an inexpensive blender to do my sofrito and guess what, this blender couldn't handle chopping the peppers let alone the garlic. I can't return the blender since I threw the box away so I will be donating it.

Author: Leonard
Title: Everything that I wanted.
Body: I couldn’t be more pleased. I use it everyday. The children love it as well.

Author: Who
Title: Broke within three weeks.
Body: I struggled to use this blender during the 3 weeks that it worked. It didn't chop ice as advertised and I had to continually stir it myself to clear the blades. I don't think this blender is meant for anything more than stirring and whipping stuff - not smoothies or frozen drinks. I was in the middle of making my morning smoothie today and as expected I needed to pick up the pitcher to mix it myself....and the entire bottom piece of the pitcher w/blade disconnected from the top and spilled my smoothie all over. So not only does it work poorly, it's defective and I'm returning this; not interested in a replacement.

Author: Anna Puri
Title: Don't have well mixing power
Body: For some reasons it won't crush to the very bottom. Has very weak mixing power.I don't like it.

Author: Mariana Garcia
Title: Doesn’t cut correctly
Body: I used it and it doesn’t cut well.

Author: Michael Angelone
Title: Severe Leaks!
Body: I received this product today and assembled it per the instructions. The second I tried to add water to the pitcher, it leaked out faster than I could replace it! So then I took the base off to make sure that the gasket was there and that I had properly assembled the unit and tried again. Same bad results! The water poured out of the bottom so bad that my kitchen counter and floor were a mess! Needless to say, I sent this piece of junk back for a refund! Do yourself a favor and DO NOT BUY this blender!

Author: Broderick
Title: Loud
Body: Brought this so I could make more then one smoothie at a time. This thing is so loud, and the longest you have it on, the louder it get.

Author: Savannah
Title: It is okay
Body: Hard to clean, wish the bottom and blade came off. It also does struggle to get going with anything frozen or ice. I am afraid the motor is going to burn out quickly.

Author: Mark Cancellieri
Title: Bad at smoothies
Body: I don't know what this blender's problem is, but it just can NOT blend. I don't know who is giving it 5-star reviews, but maybe they are making iced drinks. For smoothies it just doesn't work. No matter how finely we dice the kale, no matter how long we let the smoothie function run, it comes up with huge, leafy pieces of kale in the smoothies. Gross. As blending kale into smoothies in order to get vegetables into my kid (and I) is the whole point, this thing is functionally useless to me. Sorry- I didn't realized I needed to get some kind of fancy blender if I was going to get all exotic and add kale to our smoothies. When our old Blender broke I just got a random new one. Hopefully someone else can be saved from making the same terrible mistake.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Terrible product
Body: I don't use this blender every day because it annoys me. Doesn't chop ice very well, barely mixes. I have to stop the blender and stir my smoothies manually. Smells like it's burning. Total waste of money, very dissatisfied.

Author: Latosha M Dunn
Title: Great Addition!
Body: Definitely would recommend.

Author: Alex O
Title: Gets the job done!
Body: Great blender, haven’t had any issues thus far. It has great power, and it’s fairly easy to clean.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Study well made blender!
Body: Good blending power. Crushes ice fast. Liked the easy pour spout.

Author: Wd.Sherman
Title: This will grind anything
Body: I was so impressed with the strength and the power of the blade in this blender!! Everything about it is super sturdy. Whether you are using hot or cold liquids this blender can take it!Easy to clean and store away.

Author: Molly in Berkeley
Title: They don’t make them like they used to!
Body: I would have passed this one up if I had considered it in a store. My old one had many years of use but the plastic on this new model appears too fragile to stand up to average use. My assessment was accurate when I was unable to disengage the blender jar from the so-called collar. It refused to disengage despite being handed off to several family members all of whom were concerned that the effort was likely to damage the collar which is made of a cheap version of plastic when compared to my old blender. It finally loosened after running it under very hot water. This is not what I call ease of use. This one is going back to Amazon!

Author: Christian
Title: No longer able to use after cleaning
Body: So it’s great to blend, but it wasn’t fully cleaning with just soap and water. So I took off the base to clean peanut butter that had built up, and I couldn’t reattach the base, making it useless.I recommend a magic bullit because they are easier to maintain.

Author: diane walters
Title: Does as good job as expensive ones
Body: I like the easy use, not too noisy, not to easy to clean , clear container but kinda heavy but strong so not breakable , does all functions need. I make smoothies , but will try puree for soup feature

Author: Teacher
Title: I never loved it
Body: Sorry, blender, I never loved you. You’d only make a decent smoothie on the “grind ice” feature. I appreciated your love for the dishwasher. I don’t appreciate that you started leaking so horribly after only a year. Farewell, I’m going back to ninja brand.

Author: Ask
Title: You get what you pay for :(
Body: Power is not good

Author: Dominique Summons
Title: Hamilton never fails!
Body: I love how it does exactly what I need it do especially with my special concoctions of herbal mixes. Thank you

Author: Darla Blocker
Title: Incredible crushing power!
Body: I'm so amazed and delighted with this blender. I got it very fast and tried it today. I didn't crush ice but I crushed a frozen banana right out of my freezer making a slimfast smoothie. I couldn't believe how FAST AND QUIET it was! Other blenders I've used have ALWAYS taken at least a few times to blend well about 2 to 3 minutes and noisy. This sweet machine was NOT very loud at all and blended my drink in less than 20 seconds! I love on an apartment so I always worry about disturbing my neighbors but I'm thrilled it wasn't too loud. I just got this so only time and use will tell if it stays strong. If anything changes I'll update.

Author: Marlene Craven
Title: Great product
Body: Use blender for crushing ice. Works great.

Author: Evergreen
Title: Just what I needed for my smoothies
Body: Wish they chopped up carrots better

Author: Ruth Tardey
Title: Definitely won’t purchase this!
Body: This product is absolutely horrible!! The blending power is weak and doesn’t blend anything at all! I ended up borrowing my grandma’s blender instead.

Author: Angela
Title: False Advertised
Body: This blender cannot even chop ice. The blades are dull, not sharp at all. This would be good as a mixer rather than a blender. Do not purchase if you are looking to blend solids.

Author: denise wyatt
Title: Wonderful for the Price
Body: I love this blender! It's everything it says and more...

Author: nightshots
Title: Burned out at 3rd use!
Body: I only owned this for 6 months and used it three times before it stopped working. I was not blending anything with a hard texture but noticed a burning smell and the blender then seized up and never worked again. I bought another inexpensive Hamilton beach blender at Target a few years ago and the same thing happened. I don't feel that I would be able to return at this point since I bought it 6 mos ago...

Author: GHNC
Title: Better than expensive blenders
Body: I bought another expensive blender on Amazon that stated it was great for smoothies. It sucked. This less expensive model out performed the expensive blender and crushes frozen fruit like a champ. The expensive blender had a plastic container and the metal drive rusted. This one is glass.

Author: Patsy Young
Title: Love it! Perfect 🥰
Body: Wanted to make smoothies. It's perfect.

Author: HV
Title: Good blender for price. Good power
Body: It blend fruits well, even frozen ones. Some people complain that this product doesn't blend, but I solve it it by simply mix things around with a spoon or add more water. It's not that difficult to figure out

Author: Jerry Poling
Title: Amazing 🤩
Body: We love this so much me and my wife!! Perfect for mixing up our frappes’ in for sure !Happy new year 🥳

Author: Leonard Smith
Title: Motor seezed up after 90 day's.
Body: Motor seezed up after 90 day's. It was grinding chicken and veggies.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Arrived dirty
Body: Literally just took this out of the box and the lid has dog hair, greasy finger prints and what looks to be either feces or dirt on the clear plastic portion of the lid. 🤢 The rest of the pieces in the box appear to be unopened but I’m kind of annoyed I spent $45 on a blender for the lid to arrive absolutely disgusting. I haven’t plugged in or used it yet so this is solely based off of first impressions and I may send back. Also, the quality isn’t what I was expecting for the price.

Author: CC
Title: The noise level is low compared to some I've had in the past..
Body: Great blender no issues it crushes ice and gives my Smoothies the consistency I need..

Author: milly362
Title: Great Blender!
Body: Worked just great. Bought at the last minute because my old blender died out. Great value for the money.

Author: L. Lewton
Title: Requires mostly liquid to blend, not good for smoothies
Body: This is inexpensive and does not blend well if you try to make smoothies.

Author: Kennedine Mack
Title: Great
Body: I recently purchased the Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Blender and I am extremely satisfied with my purchase. The blender is very powerful and has a wide range of functions including puree, ice crush, shakes, and smoothies. The 40 oz glass jar is a great size and is easy to clean. The stainless steel design is also very stylish and looks great on my kitchen counter. I have used the blender almost daily since purchasing it and it has held up well to frequent use. I would highly recommend the Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Blender to anyone in need of a reliable and versatile blender.

Author: MARCIA AVIROM
Title: It doesn't blend well
Body: It doesn't work well

Author: DSWD
Title: Good
Body: We like it

Author: USIVWI UKPEBITERE
Title: Not worth
Body: The product doesn't blend fruits or vegetables properly. Often times, I had to use a lot of water just to get the blender to work.

Author: Carrie and Keith in the deep south
Title: This produce has several deficiencies.
Body: I bought this blender to replace one I bought 20+ years ago. It's been a major disappointment:- Un-blended food gets caught in the ~1/2 inch deep gap surrounding the impeller and must be dislodged with a knife and then re-blended.- The flexible plastic top doesn't stay fully seated and loosens while the blender is in use.- Doesn't have the speed needed to course grind coffee beans and beans get stuck in the gap mentioned above.This product is poorly designed.

Author: Marija
Title: love it
Body: love it

Author: Mscwong
Title: Not the best
Body: Blending power seems pretty good, but if blending smoothies, it takes a lot of hand mixing in between and shaking the whole blender to get things blended. It is fairly easy to clean. And man is this little blender on the noisier side. I wake everyone up making my morning smoothies haha

Author: Leah Yisrael
Title: It is as loud as any other blend. So don't expect it to purr like a cat.
Body: What I dislike is that the top pops up when blending. Good thing I'm standing there to pull it back down because it would probably have a mess. What I like is the fact that it is powerful, and it is easy to clean.

Author: Mike
Title: Ok
Body: Cheap stainless steel sticker Cord could be a little longer

Author: Jean Ross
Title: Great blender
Body: Was great using for soups and frozen drinks so happy I purchased

Author: S.P.H.
Title: Not worth a 💩 Died after 5 uses.
Body: Motor burned out after just a few uses, 5 or 6. No help from manufacturer in regard to warranty replacement. I wish I had just bit the bullet and bought a Ninja.

Author: JB
Title: Cheaply Made!
Body: This blender is cheaply made. It is lightweight which leads me to believe the advertised glass jar isn't glass, but some type of heavy plastic. The buttons are also quite flimsy. Definitely would not recommend purchasing this blender.

Author: rabiaa
Title: Very bad does not blend anything
Body: This is a gift from my fiancé to me unfortunately recently I open when I need and the closing window for return I cannot do it does not blend anything. It does not work at all if you press one button all the button depressed same time I’m very disappointed.

Author: Lyn
Title: Works Great
Body: Crushes frozen strawberries 🍓.That is a BIG deal! I use it to make our yogurt, cottage cheese, fruit, and granola breakfast. It works perfectly. I highly recommend this blender

Author: Read the actual facts
Title: duplicate order - returned
Body: When I went to put it away, I discovered I'd already replaced the one that had fallen apart.

Author: jc
Title: couldn't remove the base
Body: when it arrived, the base couldn't be unscrewed from the glass cup so i was unable to clean it after the first use. had to return.

Author: Kaylah
Title: Mediocre
Body: The blender works pretty good it just does not blend anything hard like frozen berries

Author: Marjorie E Miller
Title: Easy to use
Body: Great blender. Easy-to-use and easy to clean.

Author: t
Title: 3 months it stopped working.
Body: 3 months it stopped working, I didn't do anything in any way shape or form to damage this blender.

Author: George Joseph
Title: EASY TO OPERATE AND SO EFFECIENT
Body: I WAS SO EXCITED WHEN I RECEIVED THE ITEM. IT'S JUST LIKE MY OLD ONE, THAT I HAD TO GET RID OF AND IT'S SO MUCH MORE STURDY, EFFECIENT AND IT PRODUCES THE BEST SMOOTHIES.

Author: Angela
Title: Really loud
Body: Really loud, not very powerful but the glass container is easy to clean. Really solid. And Not a bad price.

Author: Kat
Title: Seems good and solid
Body: I like the feel of this. I bought it hoping that it lasts longer than other brands I've bought in the past. zi tested it for ice crushing and it was good. I haven't used it yet for shakers or blending cans of tomatoes, but feel like it will do the job.

Author: Josh Slimmer
Title: You get what you pay for
Body: You get what you pay for. It's cheap. Does not chop nuts or frozen fruit. You're better off buying a hammer

Author: rsce323
Title: Top Difficult to Remove
Body: I don't understand the number of high reviews. It's very noisy and the top is difficult to remove. I only use it for milkshakes and it definitely doesn't blend as well as my old Cuisinart. It sounds as if it's falling apart each time I use it.

Author: danarama
Title: Couldn't Be Happier!
Body: I've only had this blender a few weeks so I can't speak to its durability, but what a wonderful machine! I especially love the large, heavy, glass container which cleans much more easily than a plastic one, with no fear of scratches. Granted, IDK what might happen were I to drop it. It is very heavy....but so thick that it just might survive without problem. I use it to make post workout smoothies and it crushes ice like a champ. Just a few pulses and then I put it on the Smoothie setting for a half minute or so and the ice is fully processed and incorporated into the drink. I found by accident that in order to use the spout feature you must really press down hard on the lid to seal it. Otherwise you can just remove the lid and use the container's built in pour lip.

Author: Sandy Scott
Title: This is what I hoped a blender could be!
Body: I had a similar blender by a well known manufacturer - it recently died, and I replaced it with this one. For a blender in the same price class, this Hamilton Beach model is vastly superior. I had to wear noise dampening headphones when I used the other one, and blending a mixture that contained frozen items literally took minutes. This one does the same work in about 45 seconds land does it better. I think the reason is that this one has a nice wide bottom and then other manufacturer's model had a very slim bottom, hence the frozen stuff more readily gets to the blades on the bottom. I would say at this price point, this blender is the only choice and is a bargain!

Author: AMR
Title: BLADES SUCK after one month. Waste of money.
Body: After one month it started taking forever to blend a smoothie. The engine didn't change but the blades did. It takes 15min to blend a simple smoothie. DO NOT BUY!

Author: Patrcia C.
Title: Fell apart while making a smoothie
Body: Fell apart after 6 days.

Author: PJ Coldren
Title: Our old blender was a HB - it just gave up the ghost. This is a superb replacement.
Body: I like it because it works very well. It is easy to maneuver. It is easy to clean, inside and out. It knocks the ball out of the park in terms of blending capabilities. It wasn't incredible expensive. Our old one didn't owe us a dime; I am sincerely hoping that this one lives as long as that one did.

Author: S. Fowler
Title: The lid design is HORRIBLE
Body: The blender and the carafe themselves are perfectly suitable as far as a blending go. The power seems a bit low, but workable. I am frustrated when I see protein powder stubbornly refusing blend into the shake no matter how high I set the speed, but it's not a deal breaker. I can live with a few lumps, but it doesn't make me happy.I'd say that, all around, the blender would squeak out four stars if the lid wasn't SO terrible. Oh, my lord. This lid design is so bad that it makes my eyelid twitch.The first issue is that it's so ridiculously tight that it takes serious work to wedge it on and ALL my muscle to get it back off. I've had more than a few nervous moments where I thought I wasn't going to be able to pull it off.And, for all that, IT DOESN'T SEAL worth crap. If I really get the ingredients flying around I can watch with bemusement as the fluid slowly slips between the edge of the lid and the glass and works its way right out. That has become a kind of ironic way to time the blend for me. Right before the fluid begins to spray all over my cabinets, it's done.Of course it's not quite done because I still have lumps, but it is what it is. Times up.There's a stupid little flap that's cut out of the lid's plastic itself. I think it's supposed to be used to drop things in while the blender is running, but it's too small to even get an ice cube through in one piece. It might latch. It might not. Depends on the mood of the gods that day.I get the impression that the lid was designed by the engineer to be made of a softer plastic and some managerial genius decided they would save money by making it out of a cheaper, harder material.The pour spout is the only part of the lid that's not terrible, but with the crappy seal, when I try to use the spout, fluid is dripping from the base of the lid and making a mess anyway. This makes the spout completely meaningless.This lid is so awful that I don't think I can make this blender work long term. I've tried to be alright with it and I've kept it too long to return, but I think I'm going to give this away to someone I hate and get a new one.

Author: David Kopper
Title: Can be frustrating
Body: I bought this to make fruit smoothies, but especially with frozen fruit, it has a hard time blending. There is a LOT of poking and prodding around with a fork and stopping and starting and adding more and more water to the mixture to get it to do anything besides just build an air pocket around the blades so that they spin and don't actually touch anything in the glass.

Author: Michellann
Title: Excellent for the money
Body: Almost 2 years since purchase!!Never thought it would last this long it was so inexpensive. I make smoothies 4-5 times a week.Yes it’s noisy, but it’s sturdy and inexpensive.Would purchase again 🤘

Author: Julie Allen
Title: It does everything!
Body: Love this! Just what I wanted. It

Author: docchem
Title: Great price for a great blender
Body: Steel gears on the container and on the blender steel rotator nub.

Author: Kindle Customer
Title: Didn't blend well enough
Body: I purchased this blender to make smoothes. I don't like it my smoothes are not blended well. I use Spinach and kale, it doesn't blend. I also have a bullet and have no problem with the blending.

Author: Alejandro Mosqueda
Title: Reliable
Body: Reliable

Author: Mervin Reese
Title: Great blender
Body: I would buy again

Author: Elizabeth L.
Title: Not a food processor
Body: Reading the description, I thought this would grind cooked meat pieces.

Author: lv19565
Title: It stop working after one use
Body: I dislike that it took just one use for it to stop working

Author: Amazon customer
Title: So far, So good.
Body: Haven't had this very long but it seems like what I ordered and expected. I would probably buy it again.

Author: Justabuyer
Title: the lid gets stuck
Body: the lid suction cups around the outside of the blender and as stupid as this sounds, it was STUCK on. I have to return it, I never got the lid off. That is crazy.

Author: K.welten
Title: Disappointed Customer
Body: VERY disappointed did not work as powerful as advertised. DOES NOT work for salsas

Author: Wade
Title: Stay Away from this blender!!
Body: First of all this blender has a lot of power, for nothing. If you put ice inside, be prepared to have to physically push the ice in order to get it to blend in with your fruit and veggies or whatever you're using it for. So now I'm forcing food down to get it to catch so that it blends my smoothies, that's a pain. And after my 3rd or 4th blend, all the liquid inside the blender simply drains right down the middle. I've tightened to the point of pain in my wrist, it can't possibly get any tighter, and simply won't hold water. Do not buy it, it's more of a pain in the rear, simply spend the money and get a real blender that doesn't give you any trouble. Remember you get what you pay for.

Author: Ninah
Title: I love this blender!
Body: This blender is strong enough to make smoothies, margaritas, shakes or whatever you need in seconds. It is exactly what I wanted.

Author: ColoradoKnits
Title: After Nearly 30 Years, It Was Time...
Body: When we got married, I got a fantastic blender from my registry. I had grown up with the same brand that my mother received for her wedding. That blender still works, but the base is narrow, and not so great for making protein shakes and smoothies with ice.I looked at reviews for blenders that were NOT $300, and this once came up as a strong contender. We've only had it a few days, but have used it nonstop, with no problems.The best feature is the glass container. Most other blenders have plastic ones. This is not only better for the environment, but also it reduces the noise and ensures it can be put in the dishwasher if need be.I have had a Hamilton Beach personal blender in the past, and I blew the motor in a month, so hopefully, that doesn't happen with this larger-sized one. I'll report back if it does.

Author: Patricia Avant
Title: Excellent Blender
Body: Very pleased with this blender. Makes great almond butter

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Met all my requirements and expectations
Body: Like how quiet it is and how quickly it works. Like that the container is glass.

Author: Mark
Title: Great blender!
Body: I initially made verde sauce and red enchilada sauce

Author: T. Stein
Title: Garbage
Body: Can’t blend anything not already liquid.

Author: Erica
Title: Great
Body: Great blender for the price. Glad I went with this one over the more expensive ones.

Author: Brad Johnson
Title: Trash weak motor
Body: Weak motor, stuff gets stuck by blade

Author: Nina
Title: Gift
Body: Great gift for someone who didn't have a blender.

Author: kwade
Title: bad design
Body: the shape of the bottom prevents it from mixing all the ingredients.

Author: anonymous
Title: Started leaking
Body: Less than 1 year old and only used twice/week. Started leaking. Kept tightening it, it still leaks and now cannot unscrew the glass from the base, it is so tight. Very disappointed. Worked well before the leaking started.

Author: Laisha
Title: It's cheap and works
Body: Bought this to make salsas. Unless you want something kimda chunky, you need to add a lot of liquid. The top is hard to take off and sometimes hard to put on. Over all worth it for its price.

Author: diamond
Title: Weak
Body: Did not blend well frozen fruitRemained chunky. Not good.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Arrived Broken
Body: Glass blender cannister arrived broken, the edge had a 3 long piece chipped off. Piece wasn't in the box so it didn't happen during shipping.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: is not worth the money you spent on it
Body: Very loud didn’t even blend seamoss up to purée left chunks and seamoss is very soft already the blade a very short this blender is trash don’t buy it I should have listened I used it twice that’s all the use I got out of it before it just stopped working I only blended seamoss gel and that’s super soft the blades are very short not a good buy

Author: victoria
Title: Great tool
Body: Love this for power, cleaning ability and looks

Author: Eric Lief
Title: Great blender but the lid leaks even when sealed
Body: I was initially impressed with the looks (glass pitcher) and power of this blender. It, however, does not seal properly, and HB wouldn't even send me another lid without me sending it and then waiting several weeks for the replacement, so I returned to Amazon.

Author: kole Ade Odutola
Title: Nothing great
Body: I chose a wrong blender...

Author: J. Fuller
Title: Powerful blender - great for smoothies!
Body: Our old blender died from overuse, so this was a replacement. WOW! Love the various settings & how quickly it cuts through ice cubes. We make smoothies every day, and this blender makes it quick & easy.Easy clean-up, too - just rinse it out, add a little water & a drop of dish soap & blend it clean!

Author: SabrinaNiko
Title: Worst blender ever
Body: this blender is so terrible not sure how it even has any good reviews… it doesn’t chop anything at allllll. the worst thing i’ve ever tried!!! a waste of money

Author: Maurice & Kenzie Taylor
Title: THIS SUCKS AWFUL AWFUL HORRIBLE
Body: This is by far the worst blender we have ever purchased. Not only does it barely cut through ice but it refuses to cut through any sort of frozen fruit. The grinder would work so hard that it would eventually smell like burning plastic but would not cut any of the fruit. I don’t understand why manufacturers continue to make cheap products when they’re always going to be super awful. Just close down your business and make us pay for the expensive products. Do not buy this awful blender. It is the worst!

Author: katie clark
Title: Not a very powerful motor at all
Body: Blending power is terrible. It is unable to thoroughly blend any frozen fruit without a lot of either water or other liquid with it. I should’ve returned it to get a ninja blender.

Author: Timothy Warzynski
Title: Grand baby love it
Body: Likes

Author: Miriam Weinryb
Title: Plastic rotors in base disintegrated
Body: The plastic rotors in the base blew out and spewed plastic pieces after 2 months. The blender no longer works. What good is a 3 year warranty if the product’s parts fall apart after 15 uses?

Author: jose
Title: Muy buena
Body: La recomiendo

Author: Yurp
Title: Not bad
Body: Good for simple stuff.

Author: Miss Priss
Title: Blends wonderfully
Body: This blender is like a professional grade blender. I use it mostly to make frozen drinks. It does a great job crushing the ice. It doesn't leave any chunks at all. The blades seem very durable. The motor sounds smooth and powerful. The lid has a handy pour spout. It also looks nice on the counter. It cleans up easily. It's a little on the noisy side, but it's a blender. It's going to be noisy. I'm glad I bought it rather than spending a lot more for another blender with a prestigious name. It works just as well. I think it will last just as long.

Author: GUEST
Title: Very Satisfied
Body: Very Satisfied

Author: Catherine Crane
Title: Motor quit after 2 months!
Body: I had this same blender for 5 years until I broke the glass pitcher, so I just bought a whole new HB blender. The motor completely quit after using it for ~ 2 months about 3x per week. Is it defective or is it that HB products are just unreliable these days?

Author: Kassy D.
Title: Nothing as promised
Body: The wave technolgy just makes the product stick to the sides worse. It's noisy, there is very little difference between powers and the shape of the interior makes it near impossible to clean. My cheap walmart off brand blender was better than this. If I still had original packaging I would return in a heartbeat.

Author: Jim Maderitz
Title: Great product
Body: Great product

Author: Kelly Walls
Title: Nice blender
Body: Looks good, blends great. Glass pitcher portion holds alot. We've been on a smoothie kick after receiving this. We'll worth the money. Excellent quality.

Author: Michelle L Ryan
Title: Good Value
Body: Good Value- works well & easy to clean. I use it everyday.

Author: Brenda Colbert
Title: NO STARS, read reviews don’t buy!!!!
Body: Worst blender ever, but a usually decent brand. Doesn’t blend well at all, practically have to stir the whole way through to actually get a smoothie. My mom bought this but I was already reading the reviews and was hoping other wise

Author: Samantha A Daughtry
Title: Doesn’t blend!
Body: This blender does not blend. We have tried using it with frozen fruit for smoothies and we literally have to physically move the blender around to get it to partially blend anything.

Author: BH
Title: Power
Body: Very easy to clean

Author: Corey R
Title: Love it!
Body:
The media could not be loaded.
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

  
  
   I was a little nervous because it is not very expensive and glass but a few smoothies/shakes in and I'm convinced. It is super powerful and crushes ice and blended quickly. It's not as loud as expected compared to my last blender that took forever to crush ice. It will cut down my blend time for sure and is super easy to clean. My only regret is not buying it sooner. #cookiedoughprotienshakeforthewin

Author: D. E. Roney
Title: Plastic teeth connecting to blender blades did not engage well and wore to nubbins!
Body: The teeth on the blender base were made of plastic and it was hard to fit the blender onto it to engage & spin the blades. Get it wrong once, and they wear down to nubbins (which makes it harder to engage, which makes it more likely to wear them down)! Cheap plastic mechanism not designed well. Other than that a decent blender; however, malfunction resulted in blender going into the trash.

Author: Bible
Title: Cleaning
Body: I opened box-red instructions. Way to difficult to clean if you want to use many times in week.

Author: Stacy
Title: Works but not very powerful in blending
Body: Works ok but does not blend well shakes. I would not buy again this model .

Author: Wolfgang McLelland
Title: Blender motor gave out in : weeks
Body: Blender use is very straight forward. Doesn’t blend protein shakes (frozen fruit) very well. I got maybe 15 uses out of the blender before the motor gave out in the base.

Author: Elizabeth M.
Title: Sturdy, powerful blender with unique blending action
Body: This is a reasonably priced kitchen blender that does a great job with turning frozen fruits into smoothies. You’ll want to cover anything frozen with a liquid and let set for 10-15 minutes before blending. It’s not made to instantly liquify frozen foods! The unique blending action is wonderful for ensuring the food is evenly blended or mixed. The container is heavy-duty glass which seems as if it won’t break, ever. It is kinda heavy, though. And yes, it’s noisy but all blenders are noisy so I can’t say that’s a con. Overall, good value for the money!

Author: James Ward
Title: Underwhelming
Body: Very loud, annoying to clean.

Author: Charlene
Title: Great purchase
Body: Excellent for smoothies, shakes and anything else love it!!!

Author: JackInPV
Title: Blender works well. Rubber feet leave black marks on counter top.
Body: Leaves ugly black spots and streaks on my quartz counter top. The streaks are difficult to remove and require a lot of scrubbing to remove. I found that Soft Scrub with bleach would remove the marks with scrubbing with an abrasive sponge. So far I have not found anything to effectly clean the rubber feet so they dont leave marks. I have been placing a paper towel under the blender to prevent getting black streaks on my counter top. See photos.

Author: krista rodriguez
Title: Great blender and a great price
Body: We like our new blender. It is powerful and makes great smoothies.

Author: Burhan Hyder
Title: Good blender with poor finishing
Body: The blender is great, works just as expected. The finishing off the product is pretty bad. It perhaps looks like it's been refurbished. Other than that, no complains.

Author: Ozara O.
Title: Luv my blender!
Body: Easy clean up! Great for chopping ice and larger chunks of fruit and veggies!

Author: ZDub23
Title: Might crush a wave, but ice? Not so much.
Body: Truly disappointed in this unit's ability to crush ice. I wish I would have heeded the warnings of reviewers that had a similar experience.

Author: Tanya Luke
Title: Doesn't blend my frozen fruit for smoothies
Body: It didn't blend the frozen fruit. I made this purchase specifically for fruit smoothies. I had to continually stop the blender, and use a spoon to blend it. It was a pain in the ass, and took to long!!

Author: Luis Eduardo
Title: Excelente
Body: Lo mejor para mis licuados

Author: Same
Title: Works great
Body: Great blending power, crushes ice cubes, not super noisy. Blend lots

Author: T. Harris
Title: Perfect for smoothies
Body: I only use mine for frozen fruit smoothies and it works better than most I've tried.

Author: Chelsea Girl
Title: Works great for smoothies
Body: Works great for smoothies. It’s easy to clean, has a lot of power to make smoothies and crush ice. It’s an excellent deal for the price.

Author: Deborah
Title: Awesome! Best blender I've owned
Body: This is

Title: Average Blender
Body: I bought this blender to make smoothies. It takes awhile for it to crunch the ingredients.

Title: Broken in 1 month
Body: Bought last month and it is already broken. I used it less than 5 times... Don't waste your money.

Author: Sovi

Body: Not satisfied. It's don't really do the blender properly. I think I brought the wrong one.

Author: Pwslvr
Title: Was 5 stars but then it wasn't
Body: Worked great at first. After about 7 months it started to not grind fruit for my smoothies. Now 8 months in it takes 45 minutes to mare smoothie and its really not a smoothies.

Author: Adam
Title: noisy
Body: its loud but its a blender. kid loves it to make smoothies.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Zero power.
Body: Zero power. Took forever to make a frozen drink. I sent it back and purchased a Ninja.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Total crap
Body: Broke first time making a milkshake. It's great if you a big mess

Author: Mike64
Title: It leaks from the base
Body: It leaked the first time out of the box after cleaning. Then it continued to leak after disassembly of the pitcher and reassembly, making sure everything is tight. It blends well, not cavitating with frozen drinks. But it's worthless if it leaks and makes a mess each time.

Author: katie
Title: Didn’t blend
Body: The blender didn’t blend.

Author: Rae
Title: Great blender
Body: This is an excellent blender. Grinds ice easily. Easy to clean. Had one just like this for 30 years. Worked fantastic. Just decided to get a new one for the next 30.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Should be cheaper
Body: This blender should be $25-27 it doesn’t have strong blending power have to keep mixing it around with my large spoon in order for it to rotate or it just sits their without blending and chopping it looks like a awesome blender but it works like crap

Author: Hu-Man
Title: Small yet durable.
Body: Smaller than the typical contemporary blender yes, and as a result, you have to be more mindful of the weight of the fluid/product in the blades. Otherwise, it won’t blend until you do some internal adjusting. The main benefit for me is that it’s glass and I am no longer utilizing a plastic blender.

Author: Yennta
Title: DOES NOT CRUSH ICE. DOESN'T DO IT.
Body: Put cubes in, crushes some, doesn't crush most. Big chunks you have to spit out when you drink the blended drink. I don't understand all these reviewers who say it crushes ice. Those tiny little blades. At the bottom. I already have a blender much better than this one. I needed one that would crush ice. This isn't it.

Author: Richard
Title: Arrived not able to start
Body:
The media could not be loaded.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Hard to blend with no blade!!
Body: This is a piece of junk! Box arrived damaged! Blade to the blender was missing! This was a gift to my mom so she can blend her food to be able to eat! Can not do that with this blender as it had NO BLADE!

Author: Debi
Title: Terrible blender
Body: Terrible blender tried all options and re-read all instructions. The only positive was received quickly, cleaned easily and easy return.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: shorter blades
Body: I bought this blender about 6 months ago, to have a second blender. I also have a Oster blender of similar price point. The Hamilton Beach consistently leaves chunks of frozen fruit unblended. The Oster blender consistently does NOT do this. I have compared blades, and they have different designs. I will be giving the Hamilton Beach to Goodwill and buying another Oster.

Author: Brenda Zoliack
Title: It’s an okay blender
Body: Good for simple shakes. Nothing requiring more than 2 cubes of ice

Author: Argonaut Jack
Title: Good price for a glass blender jar.
Body: Got this to blend scratch made tomato soup because a plastic jar blender might not be up to the task of holding several ounces of simmering hot broth and veggies at once. It probably won't get used too much but if you were looking for a cheap blender to do this exact thing, I can recommend it.

Author: Codex
Title: Nice
Body: We have used it maybe 10 times for fruit smoothie making from frozen fruits, and it works flawlessly.Rinse and put soap and hot water, run it for 30s and it basically cleans itself!

Author: J
Title: Good for the price.
Body: Came without a lid, Amazon refunded me the difference so I could buy a lid. Been working fine ever since.

Author: Pat Freeman
Title: Best blender
Body: Makes great smoothies

Author: Dalton
Title: Works great
Body: It does what I want very well. I love the pour spout and the tight fittting lid.

Author: Art L.
