Title: Love it! We juice daily with a combination of ...
Body: Love it! We juice daily with a combination of ice cubed oranges and beets, and then throw in carrots, celery and broccoli stocks, combined with our homemade yogurt. In short, this is a good work out for any blender and this blender churns up the load with little effort. The blender is well made, relatively quiet as a blender can be and easy to clean. The lid secures very good but does leak a bit when trying to poor with the lid on. I simply pop the lid off and have no problems when poring. For the price, this product has been a good selection, and is a good looking design.

Author: Bryan Chovan
Title: Four Stars
Body: Blenders are GOD

Author: John
Title: Poor Excuse for a Blender
Body: We bought this blender primarily to make smoothies. I make one smoothie a day, consisting of frozen fruits (strawberries, bananas, blueberries, peaches, mangos)/greek yogurt/honey/vegetable powder. No crushed ice. I even let the fruit thaw for around 15 minutes before trying to blend.On day one, the only way I could get it to finally make a smoothie was to continually smush the fruit down with a spoon to the point where I had cut it up into small chunks myself and completely thawed it in the process. By this time, 10 minutes have gone by. This was the first time I used it.On day two, this blender could not even move a single partially frozen peach. Not even after adding yogurt. Not even after poking it with a spoon into every possible position...trying to cut it up myself like I had done the day before. Again, I spent 10 minutes trying to get it to work. Finally, I just put everything into my cheap Black & Decker food processor and made the smoothie with that. That's what I've had to do the past month, as we continue to search for a blender. Luckily, Amazon let us return it.

Author: MOHANA SUDHA BANDI
Title: One Star
Body: Not good

Author: PW
Title: Four Stars
Body: just what is advertised-really works nicely on ice crushing

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: frappes at home!
Body: I wanted a blender that would do a good job on frappaccinos. It did an excellent job at crushing the ice to make blended drinks!

Author: Janice Tarbill
Title: Love it!
Body: A great blender for a great price! Solid state and works as described! Looks great, too!

Author: Dorothy B
Title: love it for everything in the kitchen
Body: works as stated.... love it for everything in the kitchen... I make a lot of smoothies with fresh fruit that I have frozen.

Author: Daniel De' foe
Title: Not good for frozen stuff.... or ice
Body: Not a lot of power it took me ten minutes to make a smoothie. I like the glass jar and it did get it done but don't think I should have to spend 50.00 to crush ice. On the plus not it did eventually crush the frozen fruit and it was easy to clean. Every thing else it did well but the frozen stuff it does not like...

Author: Rb8
Title: Five Stars
Body: Use it everyday and is a great choice for the price!!!

Author: theresa
Title: Five Stars
Body: This is a great blender

Author: BK Perea
Title: Five Stars
Body: easy to use. perfect for what I needed

Author: Carolyn Huggins
Title: I especially like the glass pitcher
Body: This blender has proven to be quite satisfactory! I especially like the glass pitcher, as it is much easier to clean than the plastic one on my old blender.

Author: Caitlin Moore
Title: Don't even think about it
Body: This thing sucked. Firstly, it never ground ice. Ever. Not on any setting. Not even after the addition of liquid. There were always huge hunks of ice in whatever i was making. Next, The bottom never secured and would un-screw itself during blending. I didn;t even think that was possible, but with this thing it was. I was blending watermelon. freaking. watermelon. And it wouldn't blend it. You can crush watermelon with your HANDS and this wouldn't do anything. After ten minutes of fiddling and just saying i'd have chunky watermelon juice, i went to lift it up and the bottom popped off, spraying pink watermelon juice EVERYWHERE. I have white wooden walls in my kitchen. Not only was i pink, but my walls are pink and some parts still are because it stained the walls. This was a gift from my husbands previous company, and it is just as horrible as his previous job was. I'd recommend just putting down the money for a blendtec or a vitamix. More money yes, but none of the pink bullcrap. We're getting a blendtec.

Author: nphxjd31
Title: Five Stars
Body: This is a very good blender for the price. I use it everyday. So far no complaints.

Author: Jo T
Title: Five Stars
Body: Amazing for the price!!! Very happy :)

Author: Peaceful Reality
Title: I really like it so far
Body: I really like it so far. I wish it didn't have grooves down at the bottom that are so hard to clean. and, this is the first appliance i have ever gotten that DID NOT COME WITH ANY KIND OF INSTRUCTION MANUAL. SMH. do you have a manual for it?

Author: Caryl
Title: Smoothie Mom
Body: This blender works really well. I am very happy with my purchase. My daughter makes smoothies 2-3 times per day!

Author: G. L. Stone
Title: Cannot handle fruit and smells as if it is burning ...
Body: Cannot handle fruit and smells as if it is burning. Should have sent this one back. May just be defective.

Author: Tran tai
Title: Five Stars
Body: Goood

Author: dana
Title: Five Stars
Body: have not used it to much yet to say to much but as now work ok

Author: Hunmanusa
Title: It is a very nice blender but for crushing-it may crush ice but vegies ...
Body: It is a very nice blender but for crushing-it may crush ice but vegies you need a chopper. No sooner I purchased this one, I bought a more expensive unit. If it only had longer blades it would do the job.

Author: Holyh2o
Title: Five Stars
Body: Excellent quality, good price. Used almost daily. No issues.

Author: Tomas Rivera
Title: Five Stars
Body: It gets the job done. No complaints from me

Author: Tori M
Title: love it
Body: Wonderful blender. Looks nice and is great for making pina coladas! Love it

Author: Eleva Man
Title: Five Stars
Body: Crushes Ice nicely

Author: Lani
Title: Fine Product - Meets my needs
Body: Pleased with this model blender. I use it for one function: pureeing fruits, mixing icy protein drinks. I cannot eat fresh fruits or veggies, and this blender serves me well with my morning and evening nutrition shakes.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Very tight lid!
Body: Seems sturdy and not very noisy after 1 week of use. However the lid is very tight and can be difficult to open. This has resulted in a couple of spills.

Author: Trina Brown
Title: Five Stars
Body: Great blender!

Author: Rebecca Packer
Title: i like the glass bowl as opposed to plastic
Body: we make smoothies every morning, and sometimes you have to stick a spoon in there to move things around a bit but eventually it all gets blended together. i like the glass bowl as opposed to plastic, and the pour spout is nice in theory but doesn't work great in practice so i usually just take the top off to pour.very satisfactory blender.

Author: Nancy A. Jones
Title: Smart looking and does everything a blender should do
Body: Smart looking and does everything a blender should do, with eight speeds from dice to crush ice, also low to high pulse. I like the pour spout on the cap, and that the container is glass, not plastic. A great buy for the price.

Author: Brian Ogle
Title: All I can say is it looks nice coming out of the box
Body: Totally dissatisfied with this product. It doesn't blend tomatoes, onions, ice, etc. The overlapping blade design is new according to Hamilton Beach instead of the traditional X blade design. All I can say is it looks nice coming out of the box.

Author: LM
Title: Love the blender, cover is a bit odd
Body: We make protein shakes everyday so our blenders get a LOT of use.This item is very quiet and blends very well. In fact, probably the best I've had in awhile (and I've purchased a number of this type of blender in the past).My only complaint is that the cover, while it fits very nicely and does not allow dripping, still seems to be awkward in handling. I suppose I will get used to it because honestly, it doesn't drip and has a nice grip to it and as I said, the blender itself is excellent.

Author: James
Title: doesn't chop ice very well
Body: This blender is nice but it doesn't chop ice well at all but I think that's typical among all blenders. All around it's a nice blender. If you're looking for a good ice chopper look elsewhere.

Author: IT Secure Force
Title: Not worth the money
Body: As the saying goes.. you get what you pay for --- this is so true for this blender. I purchased this blender in December 2013 and it ran ok for the first time. After that, it lost its power. All I was doing was mixing powder with water - for a Post Workout Shake, and it couldn't mix the shake properly, no matter which setting I used. When in use, I have to run at least a minute for it to properly mix the drink. I have also tried mixing ice cream and milk, same situation - lacks the power to mix.This is a cheap blender, plain and simple. When in use, it also ALWAYS overflows at the top, no matter how tight and secure the top is. Also, pouring drinks is always messy from either the top cover or after removing the top cover. Speaking of the top cover, it is EXTREMELY difficult to remove after mixing. I always make a mess when removing the top cover.I don't recommend this to anyone, even to the person who is looking for a simple blender; that was me in December. It's worth looking for a better blender.

Author: Travis Shirley
Title: Excellent Power for the Price!
Body: Upgraded from an old blender to this one. So far very impressed with the power of this unit. Could be a touch quieter but I don't care about that, more interested in the results and thus far this one is delivering.

Author: Susan M Engberg
Title: Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher
Body: The blender works great and I like that the container portion is made out of glass not plastic. Good purchase.

Author: Rachel L.
Title: Great blender for price
Body: Initially was not pleased with it's performance, then I realized I had it on the low setting. When it is on high it blends my green smoothies surprisingly well. It lost one star because it is insanely loud.

Author: RAY
Title: 5star blender
Body: I had a couple of other blenders and this one for the price, stands out. Very well built, good quality and does the job very well. Can't ask for more and recommend to others.

Author: Diane
Title: Don't waste your money, invest it towards a better product
Body: This blender takes forever to crush through ingredients for a smoothie. You have to shake it or use some type of utensil to keep pushing the ingredients down so that they get mixed thoroughly. I read good reviews of this before buying it and I personally don't know how it got such good marks. I would have definitely spent more money as I now will be for a better blender.

Author: Richard Olson
Title: I've only used this once so far ...
Body: so for what it's worth I give it 4 stars for arriving in excellent condition and working well for the first smoothie I made in it. The smoothie included kale, with only the toughest stems excluded, and apple chopped into small pieces. I did not detect any stress on the gear components that rotate the container blade. A pretty cheap blender I had until recently could not handle kale.

Author: Mert
Title: It does not perform as advertised- unless.....
Body: I feel so strongly about how terrible this product performs that I have to warn other people. It does NOT crush ice. I even put a small handful of baby leaf spinach in it and it would not chop, blend, dice or even MOVE the leaves around. What are all these people doing differently than I am who gave it 4 or 5 stars?Update: The Error of My Ways - 5/27/14It turns out that it does work if you put liquid in the blender to cover the blades, and THEN put all your ingredients such as fruit, veggies and ice. That said, I just wanted to blend fruit and ice WITHOUT some other liquid.

Author: Diana K.
Title: NOT a 48 oz jar
Body: I wanted a 48 oz jar, the description of this blender says that is has a 48 oz jar, when in fact it is only 40 oz. It also has some issues when I am making a smoothie with not pulling down the mix once it is running if using frozen fruit. I will return this item.

Author: CRWarren
Title: Smoothie Heaven!
Body: Plain and simple, this thing works great. I make a banana smoothie every morning, with natural peanut butter, greek yogurt, honey and 2 % milk, and only after about 10 seconds it comes out smooth and creamy. No lumps whatsoever. My kitchenAid couldn't do that. Pulse it a few times, then hit the smoothie button. Simple as that.

Author: JDee
Title: Decent Blender
Body: I use a blender every morning for breakfast for a fruit smoothie. This blender does not purie the fruit the way my old blender did that was about 10 years old. It does the job but lacks a little power do do the job the way my old one did.

Author: The Thompsons
Title: Great blender. I mostly use it for making milkshakes
Body: Great blender. I mostly use it for making milkshakes. I don't have to stop it and stir it around with a spoon to get air bubbles out as often as I did with my twenty year old Hamilton Beach blender. It's quieter as well, much quieter and works much better than the Oster beehive blender I first bought to replace the original twenty year old Hamilton Beach.

Author: hiramknick470
Title: Cheap, Cheap, Cheap
Body: I picked this blender looking for a cheap blender for my family's use, The blender does not crush ice very well at all and I have had to adjust my recipes to handle it. The lack of an off button makes for some near misses as well.

Author: anh57
Title: Great Blender!
Body: It's a great blender for its price. I've been looking for a blender that doesn't make too much noise and powerful at the same time. I use it to make my protein shake and smoothie. It breaks/grates most of the frozen fruits and ice except sometimes I have to open the lid to stir it. Would definitely recommend it!

Author: jaz
Title: Half the time
Body: I can only give this 3 stars (it would've been 2 1/2, but feeling generous), only because it seems to work half the time. There have been mornings that I have put my smoothie ingredients in, switch it on, and there she goes! Then there are mornings like today. It didn't matter how much I stirred it, used different functions, pulsed it, it just didn't want to grab ahold of the ingredients. It just sat and made a bunch of noise, and I got a gritty and chunky smoothie for breakfast. I have no idea why...maybe I just received a picky one. I generally make the same kind of smoothies, so it's not that the ingredients are different. Ice, almond milk, banana, berries and protein powder. I think a blender should be able to handle that.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Makes great smoothies
Body: I bought this to replace a nutribullet that broke within 30 days. I don't like buying things I have to baby so the nutribullet went back to the store. This baby is my kind of blender. It chops up fruit and veggies and blends them so that other than the color and taste you can't tell what you started with. The nutribullet didn't blend as well as this and it wasn't nearly as powerful.

Author: jennifer ocain
Title: Nice Blender
Body: I liked the blender- it is exactly as represented and it does the job! It shipped free as promised too unlike 2 of the items on my order.

Author: Wesley Stanford
Title: Don't listen to reviews about lid not coming off!
Body: This blender will not disappoint. First off, to everyone saying the lid is hard to get off, it's only due to suction, open the clear pouring flap, then the lid removes without ANY issue whatsoever. This blender is much more quiet than my old one, and there's NO need to start the blender, stop, stir, repeat like the blenders I've had in the past. It truly does stir the ingredients as advertised. AMAZING. Purées ice impressively! Takes less than 30 seconds to make an icy drink/smoothie, and it comes out smooth with no ice chunks! I can't review based on longevity but so far this blender is worth spending a few extra dollars!

Author: ROBBIE
Title: AMAZON COMPARISON CHART OF DIFFERENT MODELS INCORRECT
Body: COMPARISON CHART ON AMAZON SHOWS THIS MODEL AS HAVING PLASTIC BOWL WHEN IN FACT IT ARRIVED WITH GLASS BOWL. WANTED THE PLASTIC BOWL.

Author: Shirley White
Title: Met My Expectations
Body: This blender is fabulous. Should indicate we mostly use it for making smoothies, so we do not put a lot of hard to chop items in it. However, it does chop ice to our satisfaction. The manufacturer must have worked on the hard to remove lid issue because with just a light tug we are able to remove the lid. We hope this item is around for a long time.

Author: Bob
Title: Blender
Body: Better than I expected. The blender is in perfect condition and has more features then I really thought it would have.

Author: Amber Melendez
Title: Okay blender, not great
Body: I find that this blender does struggle when I mix frozen berries and yogurt. I have trouble using some of the recipes I have for smoothies unless I soften the berries in the microwave beforehand or add more liquid (i.e.: milk).It's not a terrible blender, however, if you're really into yogurt based smoothies, you may have some issues with it. When it comes to crushing ice, this blender works well and I love using it for iced coffee drinks. I have yet to use it for anything other than smoothies and drinks. It's very easy to take apart in order to clean and I do love the way it looks in my kitchen.

Author: Jammsac
Title: OKAY
Body: A nice low end blender that will blend most of your vegetables. Please do not try to blend ice. it will just push it around. it you want to blend ice buy a ninja.

Author: Booklady
Title: Blender
Body: A welcome addition to the Kitchen! My daughter loves it! It took a while to get there, but now it's making delicious smoothies.

Author: amalia andazola
Title: good blender
Body: I like the blender itself. only dislike the lid, doesn't have snug fit which causes liquid to spill out of the blender.

Author: ttmadison
Title: Lasted 6 years, Heavy glass jar, but seems to work fine
Body: Update: this blender lasted six years before the motor and base burned out. The glass jar is still fine, though. I recommend hand washing all the parts of this blender because if you put anything in the dishwasher, it tends to warp plastic parts and make them not fit together. Old review: This glass jar, especially when filled with liquids, is fairly heavy. And even though I thought I had chosen a large-capacity jar, this jar seems smaller than my plastic blender's. Everything seems to work okay, though.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: powerful
Body: I was using some single serving small HB blender that had a really weak motor. It blended smoothies alright, but not all that smooth. It had difficulty blending a lot of ingredients. Anyway, this one is loud as hell, I feel guilty for my neighbors if I use this thing after 10. Still it kicks everythings ass and makes a perfectly smooth smoothie. The stainless steel gives it a higher end look. I think it looks and blends extremely well, especially for $30

Author: Douglas
Title: Worst blender I have ever had!!!
Body: Don't waste your money! Could not blend ice or frozen fruit. Seriously save your money and buy a better blender. Off to Walmart we go for a better blender.....

Author: Starz4you
Title: Excellant Blender Reasonably Priced
Body: Excellent blender, reasonably priced. You can't beat it for value, looks and functionality. The pour top is a great idea and useful. The container is made of glass. It has a pulse button. It is relatively quiet for a blender. The comments about difficulty in taking to top off are exaggerated. Yes its is stiff, but doable. Do you want a tight seal or the contents of your blender on your walls cabinets and clothes? I haven't chopped ice with it. My last blender was a pricey Cusinart, that looks more solid and refined but at triple the price point. I wouldn't hesitate to buy another or give it as a gift.

Author: gerard decarolis
Title: junk
Body: do not buy this blender unless you just want to stir water. the gears stripped out after the 10 uses. save your money and buy a ninja

Author: Dimps
Title: GREAT BLENDER
Body: BEST ONE I'VE HAD IN A LONG TIME! I EXPECT IT TO KEEP GETTING THE JOB DONE FOR A LONG TIME.

Author: SouthBay Don
Title: Bought it to make Smoothies
Body: Like most people, I've always had a blender. My last one I burned out trying to grind up peppers that had not re hydrated enough, but what I usually used it for was smoothies, like 99% of the time. This blender just does not do the job. Previous blenders I've owned, you just threw the ingredients in and started it up and it blended them. This blender needs to be started nd stopped so you can push the mixture down to get the blades to actually blend the ingredients. Can't comment on any other features since to date I've only used it for smoothies.

Author: Happy girl
Title: A perfect blender with a perfect lid
Body: I do not know why people are complaining with the lid. The lid is just perfectly tight. I think its noise is little lower than the other products. It is perfect for smoothies. But the container is little smaller for a family.

Author: spooky
Title: Very nice
Body: I am very pleased with this blender. It does all I want it to. I make smoothies and shakes so far. I hope to learn more things I can do with it. I have had it about three weeks. It is well made and sturdy. I would recommend this blender to anyone.

Author: MARILYN M.
Title: just what i needed
Body: I think this blender will last longer than any of the other I've used. I use my blender everyday so it needs to hold up for me.

Author: anonymous
Title: Very powerful --- does the job.
Body: This works very well. I have had blenders that I paid much more money for that did not have the power that this on has. Also it is glass. I have no complaints.I use this primarily for smoothies...it does frozen fruit well as long as there is enough liquid in there. Put the liquid in first.I also use it for Hummus. Really like the performance, not too loud. Easy to clean. Looks nice on my counter but I prefer white appliances.My only complaint is that the top is too hard to remove if you put in on all the way. It is not necessary to push the top in all the way...nothing leaks out unless you have filled it too high. If you push the top all the way in/on it is very hard to remove.Overall, this is a good buy.

Author: gcstudent
Title: Great item for the price!
Body: I bought the item primarily for making smoothies. It does so with no problems. I wish the cord was a little longer, but other then that I am completely happy with this purchase!

Author: HJ
Title: crazy power for the price
Body: I gave this 5 stars because you cannot beat the power for the price. This thing is a workhorse for normal use. Nice glass vessel and will crush ice and frozen fruit in a very short amount of time. It's easy to clean. I use it almost every day and it still works like new.

Author: Jacob Ward
Title: Decent for the price
Body: I bought this hoping it would be a step above the cheap big-box store blender which finally died after a few years. Turns out it's pretty much the same. The base feels like cheap plastic. The stainless steel elements are cheaply applied and the area behind the buttons is just a sticker. The buttons rattle and there is no dedicated off button, both of the pulse buttons function as off buttons. Aesthetics and interface aside, it works about as well as other cheap blenders. I'm not convinced of the wave-action system, as it seems that any mixture that is even slightly too thick will just develop a pocket of air at the blades which will just spin freely.

Author: John Hathaway
Title: Great product for multitude of tasks!
Body: I love this blender and have used it for numerous different projects, including juicing and food processing! powerful motor that crushes ice easily! Quick arrival time as well on shipping--no complaints as of yet!

Author: AmandaH
Title: great
Body: way better then my old blender. ive been using the same blender for like 10 years. wouldn't work always. this is great. perfect for smoothies. blends everything wonderfully

Author: JOHN S.
Title: A Great looking Stainless Steel Blender
Body: This blender matches my stainless steel kitchen. I bought this to replace the Black and Dcker blender that was defective. It sounded like it was grinding marbles. This one is much quieter. As usual Amazon delivered it quickly.

Author: Elcongolfer
Title: Blender
Body: This blender works pretty good. My only problem with it is that I have a real problem chopping ice cubes with it. It seems to stall out and then start up again several times before it runs smoothly and continuously. I also have a problem with the tightness of the lid seal. It is very difficult to remove but I am sure it will loosen up over time.

Author: GB
Title: works well enough
Body: not nearly as powerful as I'd hoped, but does the job. My last ancient blender managed to crush up the tiny seeds in blackberries, but this one can't and I guess I've gotten a little spoiled. Use it mostly for morning smoothies with ice, and greens like kale or spinach and frozen fruit. Found I need to quick-blanch the kale to make the blender more user friendly. Hope it holds up because it's gonna get a lot of work

Author: Danielle
Title: great price and perfect small blender
Body: I was a bit skeptical on how this was going to arrive since I ordered a used one! technically its not used it just has a small cosmetic damage it said(which you wont notice unless your examining it very closely!!). it took 3 days longer than the official delivery date, but I have to say I'm impressed and thinking of buying more used items for a less price . Its brand new, I love the size its medium size, I don't consider it too small. Works great with smoothies and salsa! (I've only used it for that) all in all extremely pleased and used items at cheaper price are basically perfect.

Author: Melissa K. Cortes
Title: Good- But wished it crushed ice better.
Body: Ok I spent a TON of time scouring over reviews of blenders in this price range. This one was the best value for the money.Pros- I love the large glass pitcher, it looks great on my counter. It's not nearly as loud as other reviewers said it would be. Its quieter than my last one. The cord is long enough. It is sturdy. It appears durable. It cleans very easy. It blends soft things together really well including spinach into my smoothie. The pouring spout in the lid is nice if you choose to put the lid on. The various settings are nice but I really only need one so I haven't tried the lower settings.Cons- It does not crush ice nearly as well as I'd hoped. The blades are too far from the sides and the ice just gets stuck there and never fully crushed. I make a double berry smoothie every morning and I ended up just taking the ice out altogether. Usually I only have 1 or 2 berries that don't get blended so it's not too bad. Maybe more liquid would solve this problem but I worry about it being too watery. It does not grind things well. My last blender was a cheap-o one and it blended steel cut oats to a nice powder for extra fiber in my smoothie. This one completely fails at that. The lid is also Extremely tight. So much that I pulled it off the second day and resolved to just hold the thing on rather than push it all the way down. This works totally fine and is a lot faster. The holes in the lid to add things are way too small. Sometimes you have to shake or jiggle it in order to get ingredients on top to get pulled down, but I think this just may be a blender thing. The space under the blades where the bottom ring comes off tends to get berry seeds stuck in it and I have to work a little harder to get it clean.Hope this helps the next potential buyer with your decision.All in all I really like it and I'm glad I got it.

Author: Jill Hughes
Title: great blender
Body: I really love this blender, makes great smoothies. My old one wouldn't even crush the ice. Best blender I've had.

Author: IShopAmazon24x7
Title: works fine
Body: I read the other reviews and bought this because my mother has an older model that kicked my Cuisinart's butt for making smoothies. This model is not as quiet or as powerful as Hamilton Beach that my mother has, and her model is discontinued. However, this does a fine job. I miss the removable top screwcap that my Cuisinart blender had. Although the Wave Crusher has a small tabbed opening through which you can feed things into the blender while it is going, there's really not enough space to shove anything bigger than half a strawberry through. You can't, for instance, add scoops of powdered supplements while the blender is going, unless you use a funnel. Also, as someone else mentioned, the pour spout is pretty much useless. I take the lid off. :)

Author: Laura O.
Title: HAMILTON BEACH WAVE CRUSHER MULTI-FUNCTION BLENDER
Body: IF YOU LIKE TO ENJOY THE SMOTHIES ?, THIS IS YOUR BEST OPTION. I REALLY ENJOY TO USE WITHOUT WORRIES WHEN I CRUSH ICE CUBES

Author: Amaryllis J. Weeks
Title: Great machine for what is can do.
Body: 700 Watt max motor, it has enough power for what I need. Looks great, performs well, the wave action helps to circulate everything, cleans easily.

Author: Prometheus
Title: Design failure
Body: Its a pretty nice little blender but has an issue. The lid has a mess-free spout with hinged cap which is nice. But the other side of the lid a has vent opening. The vent opening is just a piece of plastic that folds back and forth with no hinge. I can see in the future it wearing out and breaking off. And guess what happens then? No more mess free blending. I would not buy it again.

Author: Karen
Title: Piece of crap
Body: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas so she could make smoothies. The blades spin and make a hole in the center leaving the ingredients on the sides not moving at all. I bought it because I wanted something that would crush ice. When we do get some of the ingredients to move, the ice just bounces around. VERY disappointed!!!

Author: Eric V.
Title: Im spoiled - works good.
Body: At home I use a Vitamix which is on a whole different level.Bang for the buck this blender cannot be beat.I use this for the office and it is holding up well.

Author: M. Jackson
Title: BEST BLENDER EVER
Body: I use a blender to mix my protein shakes and this one is the best I've ever had. It's perfect for crushing ice & frozen fruits with it's multi-button & swirl action. You will not be disappointed!

Author: My Kim
Title: Didn't work.
Body: I was so excited when the blender came in, but sadly, the excitement didn't last. I plugged it in, and it did spin, but that was all it did. The blade spun inside the pitcher, but it didn't crush, puree, or do anything to the fruit. Nada. Nothing. The fruit just sat there. Returned it the next day.

Author: David
Title: good blender
Body: This blender was bought to replace another blender that was unusable.This blender is easy to use and easy to clean

Author: Karen Page
Title: worked great.. for 2 months
Body: When i bought this blender 2 months ago, i was initially very pleased with the look, weight and performance. the only drawback i could see was the very cheap lid that neither conforms to the look of the rest of the blender, nor fits firmly into the glass container. in other words, you have to hold it on the entire time you're blending lest it go flying across the kitchen. anyway, this was barely a complaint because i figured the great price justified cutting a few corners and i'd rather them cut corners on a loose lid rather than a faulty jar/base/motor. [EDIT: I must have been sent a different sort of lid than some of the others who have written reviews. maybe they are testing out different types of lids.]unfortunately, the blender's performance has steadily declined to the point where it's now essentially useless. in my household, this blender gets frequent usage, mostly for making 1-2 smoothies/day from a combination of fresh and frozen fruit and almond milk. probably the frozen fruit is what dulled the blade but the photo on the article with a giant jar full of ice and fruit had me thinking the blender could handle it.incidentally, despite that photo, this blender was almost never great with ice. once or twice i got a nice slush but usually i end up with huge ice chunks, or if i keep blending, no ice at all, just a watered down smoothie. another drawback i was willing to overlook, and simply stopped adding any ice to my smoothies after the first few times.these days if i want to blend up a smoothie, i can look forward to spending 10-15 minutes stopping and starting the blender every 20 seconds and stirring things around trying to get it to break down the fruit. the amount of liquid is immaterial; the blade is simply too dull to be effective.this blender may still be recommended for people who only blend occasionally, or tend to blend softer foods like cooked vegetables for soup or something.

Author: Eileen Nephin Bish
Title: Smooties here we come!
Body: Wow -- brilliant -- this blender really does the whole nine yards! Ice gets crushed, fruit is mixed in very well, even the yukky kale dissappeared into the whirring mixture...and made everything drinkable -- so daughter will be happy that old Mom has finally climbed aboard the smoothie bandwagon, and even Dad liked his fruit milkshake!

Author: Galina
Title: this is a 'blender?'
Body: I'm mystified by + reviews of this, the worst blender I've ever used. The tiny blade literally does not cut it!If I could have seen this sub-par blade in more pics, I would not have bothered.Leaves many small pieces of fruit, sucks for making smoothies- they are far from smooth. Back it goes.

Author: BR2811
Title: Great for smoothies
Body: This is my second Hamilton Beach Wave. The first was a cheapone from WalMart. It had a less powerful motor and the jar was plastic. I burned up the motor in about 6 months. I still like the design of this blender over the regular shape. Before buying this blender I bought an Oster, mainly for the name. It has a smoothiefunction, but does not work well. It creates air pockets and the contents of the jar are not blended or the ice crushed.

Author: Med
Title: Happy
Body: This was purchased as a gift and was very well received. Has many nice features, and is a good size.

Author: nicole r. burkett
Title: perfect blender
Body: I was skeptical about this blender, but my family needed one. The we had died right before thanksgiving. As a family we have smoothie night& make them often as part of eating healthy. I ordered it& had it shipped to the house and the love it. They love the top with the pourer so there's no mess with pouring the smoothies out& it's lightweight compared to the last one that died. My family told me it was perfect.

Author: dawn m.
Title: love it
Body: Love this blender! We use it every morning to make protein shakes and it crushes ice easily. Lid is a little hard to remove.

Author: Marlborough S., CHIP, Nichols, ND.
Title: BEST BLENDER BUY BY FAR
Body: I love my new Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Multi-Function Blender.I read up on lots of blenders, and I decided to buy this one.Good choice all the way around!!I got a great blender at a great price!I have used hundred dollar plus blenders for decades,and this H.B.Wave Crusher is their equal at 1/3 the price.Everything about it is a big hit.Easy to use, clean, and store.It does a great job on my healthy cocktails consisting of2 kinds of green leafy vegetables (usually kale or spinachplus parsley), fresh tomatoes, fresh cranberries, anotherkind of fresh berry (if good, organic ones are available ---if not, I'll use frozen), a half a pippin apple, and oftentimesanother fresh fruit, with pineapple being my favorite, butmelons and tangerines are good, too.I fill the glass pitcher to the top with these veggies & fruits.I pour in a glass of pure water, hit the first button, andlet her rip. I blend for approximately 30 seconds, or so.Actually, I just eyeball it until it looks right.One can use whatever vegetables and fruits they like - - -and/or whatever is available. Try about a 3 inch chunk ofcucumber and/or a jalapeno pepper for variety.I prefer organic and local whenever possible.This recipe makes several tall glasses of my living cocktail,and it fills me up and satisfies me very nicely for lunch.I enjoy this living lunch probably 4 or 5 times a week.Cleanup afterwards is a snap.I really, highly recommend this fine blender. . . . . . .And this is a great price for such a fine appliance.

Author: mobeall
Title: Blender gift
Body: As this was given as a gift, I cannot comment on its quality or performance. However, I have had no negative comments from the person who received it.

Author: Matthews
Title: Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Multi-Function Blender
Body: I love it and I will refer it to others as well. It is a great item I love it

Author: Michael E. Rafferty
Title: Works Great
Body: Use it all the time to make smothies for our health. Performs great as it chops up fruit with no problem.

Author: dking
Title: Pretty nice
Body: I've only used it a few times so I'm not sure if it is a sturdy long lasting product, but it does function well and does its job!I didn't have any problem grinding up almonds and so, but I think it needs liquid to go through it thoroughly.It has several different options, and it is easy to clean using the functions.The only thing is the lid is a bit stiff which made it a little difficult to pull off but that's not a big problem.The beaker is made of thick glass so it's kind of heavy.

Author: Judith
Title: Cheap Plastic
Body: I had the HB 50754 which worked great with dishwasher washing for years.This thing is total plastic crap. The lid clips on by bending the ends of the plastic into ridges to stay ... not at all firm and worse the motor clips and bottom are plastic too. Does not get enough aeration for mayo or other items.

Author: Bunny, NY 11/10/2010
Title: Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Multi-Funtion Blender
Body: Pretty good blender for the money. Worked as advertized. No problem to speak of as yet, will update if I do. The price was very reasonable for this blender.

Author: JM85
Title: Average
Body: It blends okay, but next time I will probably spend more money to get one that is faster and quieter.

Author: Stephanie Darnell
Title: Good price, good look, but wish I had purchased a different one.
Body: it's loud (but it is a blender, after all). I thought the lid with the pour spout might be troublesome in some way, but it is actually a very nice feature. I have never tried to grind ice in it, so I can't speak to how well it does that. I make a smoothie every morning out of protein powder, milk, and a banana and some of the powder would always stay clumped up on the sides of the pitcher and I'd have to soak it everyday. I might think this has something to do with the powder, but it never happens in my higher quality mixer (that also has a plastic pitcher...no idea if that is related to the issue or not). It is a decent blender for the price, but I would like to be able to rinse the pitcher and be done with it. With this one, I have to soak it and still scrub to get the residue out. Also, it is very attractive and looks great out on my counter.

Author: JerzeyBird
Title: Really Like This Blender
Body: Great blender, especially for the price. Does everything I need it to do. Powerful yet not overly loud. Blends and purees completely and quickly. Handles ice easily. Compact size, which is great for the space I have. Cleans easily.

Author: Steve Fischkin
Title: Piece of crap lid
Body: Let me start off by saying I bench press close to 400 lbs and I have to use almost all of my strength to get the lid of this blender. Whoever engineered this thing is a moron.

Author: E. A. Montgomery
Title: No Frills, Good Performance
Body: First use smelled like burnt rubber, but subsequent uses have been great. Much better than a far more expensive blender it replaced. Doesn't pulverize seeds, etc, but makes a decent fruit and ice smoothie quickly and easily. For the price, if it only lasts a year I'll still be way ahead over the cost of buying my smoothies in a shop.

Author: nancy j jones
Title: Great pouring spout; lumpy remainders
Body: My old blender leaked (annoying), but was better at pulverizing ice or icey fruit for smoothies than this one. This leaves small lumps of unblended stuff no matter how long I run it and is the reason for a less-than-perfect rating.

Author: Jaye
Title: Burned out with first use
Body: It looked great when I took it out of the box. I like that the lid locks. But it burned out and got super hot the very first time I used it. I had to replace it with a new one.

Author: Steve
Title: Great blender for a great price
Body: For the price, this blender is a great buy! It crushes any amount of ice just fine, hasn't leaked once after a few months, and it is a good size. These pour spout on the lid can be handy too (pouring out of the wide mouth of a blender always seems to make a mess).Great buy.

Author: Laciejay
Title: No-function blender
Body: This blender needs only one option, on. I have the hardest time blending or dicing anything in it. I have to constantly shove a spoon in it to mix stuff around because everything just gathers underneath the blade. It doesn't crush ice like it says, it won't even blend ice cream without being half full of milk. Horrible item, I would never recommend this to anyone who actually needs it to work.

Author: Theodore S Good
Title: Yes Awesome blender !
Body: I use this mainly to make smoothies and its awesome! Simple to use, cleans up in seconds, great buy!! Buy it!

Author: Nadine G.
Title: Works well
Body: It works well for everything I put in it UNTIL, I tried to make cashew butter in it. That burnt out the motor :) So, do not make nut butter and everything will be just Fine LOL Oh, and I could have a conversation while running it until, well, you know :)

Author: Susan Rae
Title: Smoothies at college!!
Body: Bought this as a gift for my niece who is away at college. She loves it!! Great drink and smoothie maker.

Author: BCGome
Title: Great Buy
Body: This blender performs very well. I keep it on top of the kitchen counter for easy use. It was a great value for me and for money well spent.

Author: Maryam Sotoodeh
Title: Hamilton beach wave crusher
Body: i don't like it at all cheap quality Hamilton beach wave made,please don't buy this model! look for something else

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Not blending frozen fruits very well...
Body: I purchased this Wave Crusher with the intention of making healthier, home-made smoothies. When I put in the pre-sliced, pre-packaged frozen bananas, strawberries and blueberries, ice and Silk Milk, the blender would not puree the fruit very well at all. It was still chunky and frozen after 1-2 minutes of pulsed and then steady blending. Unless there are hidden secrets to making a smooth smoothie, then I'm disappointed in this product.

Author: Johna Jean Ramos
Title: Don't get this blender!
Body: I used it a few times to make shakes. It no longer works! DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!! What a waist of money!

Author: Natalie Fayman
Title: Great while it lasted, but....
Body: Seemed like a sturdy blender and worked great for frozen fruit smoothies. I left it on my kitchen counter, plugged in and ready to use. One day, I came home from work and the thing was running full-blast, and there were plastic shavings all over my counter! The gears were completely shredded. Had to throw it out. I only had it for just over 3 months. Of course, this happened only after the Amazon return window had expired. Blenders that mysteriously turn themselves on for no reason are generally NOT a good thing. I'm just grateful it didn't burn my house down.

Author: Vegas Vixen
Title: Ok
Body: I got this because the reviews were pretty fair. I do not know of i got crappy one or not. The blend seems to constantly get stuck and dtop working after 10 seconds of crushing of latte chips. It is very loud. I wish my kids had not destroyed the box 5 seconds after I got this because I would have returned it.

Author: pirate89RAWR
Title: Getting more than you pay for
Body: I know what you're expecting from this blender, given the price. Don't be too quick to judge!While this blender is not one of those several-hundred-dollar, fancy-shmancy, pulverize your keys and silverware blenders, it can make some amazing things for you at home!There are two different pulse settings, making chopping more evenly a breeze. The milkshake button makes a smooth shake! Ice crushing is no challenge.No burning motor smells.Super easy clean-up with a self-cleaning button!For the price, this blender really has it all!I love it!

Author: Classic_Rock_fan
Title: Great value for the money
Body: It does all I need it to and it is simple to use. It is so simple to assemble (it is basically done for you). I highly recommend this.

Author: DMC85
Title: blender
Body: The blender works better then other kinds u have used. The only flaw I have is it look cheap..from the look of it I think it was a Lil overly priced

Author: N. Harris
Title: Excellent
Body: My old blender broke so I ordered the Hamilton and I am so glad I did. I use it mostly for making fruit smoothies with frozen fruit, juice and yogurt so I need a strong blending action. It is excellent. Strong, quiet, and easy to clean. I would recommend it without reservation.

Author: J, Hunte
Title: Blender
Body: Sent as gift to my grandson in university. he is completely satisfied. He and his room mates love it. thanks.

Author: Mr. Virgil F. Cross
Title: hamilton beach blender
Body: Does not beat ice cream. Leaves lumps and tkes forever to even reach that point. Terrible design on the blades.

Author: 13Sparks!
Title: Great product!
Body: Blender is great and it does its job. Instructions are super poorly written without details about what each speed does. It has some images about the parts attachments and steps, howewer, the text around it does not describe or explain the figures at all.

Author: detroitrapunzel
Title: HB has not dissappointed
Body: I was scared to try this because of some of the reviews but the price was right and i needed a blender. I could not be more pleased with the way this works. It does everything I want it to. It is fast and easy to clean. the top is a little hard to get on and off but it loosened up with use. I use this everyday. sometimes twice a day for smoothies and LOVE IT. and yes a blender is loud but this is not overly loud. Actually it is on the quiet side for a blender.Overall... Very Pleased.

Author: Southern Girl
Title: Works good with smoothie recipe
Body: I have been using this blender for about a month to make a smoothie for my breakfast. I have altered slightly the recipe that Hamilton Beach included with this blender, and it really does a good job with this smoothie. The only thing that I don't like about it is the lid is hard to get off. I hope after the new wears off, the lid will eventually come off easier. Other than the lid problem, I am totally and completely satisfied with this blender. However, I have not used it for anything else other than the smoothie.These remarks are additional remarks to my original remarks: I have had two of these blenders. Each one has done a good job, but it has a black exhaust that comes out of the back of the machine and stains my white counter top. It is real hard to clean this off the countertop.

Author: DoubleDensity
Title: Great Blender for the price!
Body: Works great and has a great price. It also looks great with the stainless steel and black exterior. The only problem I have is that when making a smoothie, sometimes the frozen fruit freezes together and creates a jam which you must remove the cover to dislodge. That's not really the blender's fault though. For the price with free shipping, you can't beat it!

Author: Andrew
Title: Works
Body: I've had this blender for about 4 months and only have used it 3 times but it works. I just wanted point out that the metallic looking border around the buttons on mine is starting to come off.

Author: Dana
Title: Good
Body: I've only used it a couple times so far but I was able to make a kale drink without issue.

Author: Brooke
Title: AMAZING.
Body: Works Perfectly. I bought this to replace my boyfriends old blender. And It is the best blender I have ever owned. We use it for frozen fruit smoothies and stuff like that and its just perfect! I highly recommend it.

Author: Danielle
Title: so far so good
Body: i'm keeping my fingers crossed. this blender has done a wonderful job crushing ice for smoothies. I LOVE the spout on top. I did not know blenders are made of plastic. the entire blender minus the glass jar is plastic so really interested to see how long this lasts in my house.

Author: Amber
Title: I use it all the time
Body: I really like this blender. It works as it should, I use it all the time :)Great product for the price!

Author: CO
Title: Great blender for the money
Body: I considered the brands and prices available on Amazon, and the Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher was the winner. It really is---for the money it works as well and has the same features as pricier brands. Very content!

Author: Nell
Title: Great smoothie maker!
Body: The reviews about the lid being hard to take off are very true. But that really is the only negative!

Author: jack polatnick
Title: No better value blender
Body: Outstanding value, excellent performance. Works as well or better than my old $100 Kitchen Aid blender. Time will determine its durability.

Author: raupete
Title: Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Multi-Function Blender
Body: This was purchased as a gift for my daughter-in-law who reports it meets all specifications and performs excellently in its blender functions...

Author: Jill Nau
Title: Best Blender EVER
Body: This is the best blender I have ever used. Blends a perfect smoothie with zero chunks left in the bottom. Blended in seconds. LOVE IT!

Author: Mike Rogan
Title: Good glass jug but below expectations in motor housing
Body: The unit comes with a solid glass jug but the plastic motor housing and button assembly was below my expectations

Author: Barbara DeMarco-Barrett
Title: Looking for the perfect blender? This t'ain't it (but it's not bad)
Body: Don't get me wrong, it's a good enough blender. But it's no better than our last. We were looking for a high velocity blender that you can throw ice and frozen fruit and coconut milk into, turn it on, and watch it blend without having to dunk a spoon into it to stir it up to get it blending. Next step: the Ninja or Vitamix. The wide mouth jar-style of this blender is nice, for cleaning, mostly. So....as the three stars say, it's okay. Not miraculous, but okay.

Author: J. Mankel
Title: started leaking after 8 months
Body: I liked it at first. I didn't use it to crush ice or anything just to mix protein shakes. I purchased it from Amazon.com because they have a good protection plan. Well not with this blender. It started leaking after just 8 months and I didn't even use it every day. Put your money somewhere else. I can't even reach Hamilton Beach for the warranty assistance. I'm sorry I bought this thing now

Author: princetaffy
Title: does the job
Body: it does whats its supposed to do.recommend, works, looks a lot more expensive than it costs.the brands been known for affordable reliable products which is a plus

Author: Starr Shopper
Title: Probably a good blender, but not for grinding kale.
Body: This is probably a great little blender, but I wanted it for making kale smoothies. I returned it and got a Ninja instead.

Author: Eleanor
Title: Works great.
Body: So far so great. This blender has made smooth smoothies, even with frozen fruit.The lid fits pretty tight, but that's because of the pouring aspect of it.

Author: farcha
Title: Not a Vitamix but a good blender for about 10% of the price
Body: It's not as powerful as the top rated product but on the other hand, I could buy 10 of these for one of those. And it works! I use it mainly to make fruit/veggie smoothies and it does a very good job for this purpose. I always 'smooth' the fruits first and then add a few handfuls of greens, mostly spinach or kale. Admittedly, the greens don't get as smooth as the fruits but they're fine enough. And unlike the Vitamixes, this blender actually sucks everything to the bottom. There's no escape for any ingredient! :) All in all happy with my purchase.

Author: UMM2012
Title: Very pleased
Body: Whips up a smoothie very well, but I was a bit disappointed when I used it to mix cottage cheese, sour cream, cream cheese and the rest of the ingredients for a cheese cake. My food processor broke and I was disparate to smooth out the cottage cheese. It took a while because it seemed like the top of the liquid wasn't being pulled to the bottom. I didn't have this problem with the smoothie ingredients. I figured perhaps the cheese was too thick and I was trying to make the blender do something it wasn't designed to do. Cleaning it is very easy and I haven't had any leaks. I bought it for smoothies, and it works very well for that.

Author: Shannon
Title: Does its job for the most part.
Body: I've had this blender about a month and I use it twice a day to make protein shakes. It does an ok job most of the time but it really seems to struggle at others. Sometimes I have to shake it a bit to make sure it blends evenly or I have to stick a spatula in there and make sure it got everything. Overall, for the price, its decent and I can work with it.Things I love about it:- Its easy to take apart and clean- Its made of glass- It has units of measurements on the side (makes it way easy to measure milk!)Things I dont like about it:- The gears are made of plastic (I dont expect them to last forever)- Its REALLY loud when you are doing the smoothie setting (scares the crap out of my 18 month old)- Sometimes ice or fruit gets stuck under the blade and doesnt get blendedEven though it has some problems, I will be keeping it. I would recommend it to anyone who is not looking to spend a small fortune just for a blender.

Author: DM
Title: hamilton beach
Body: It's take long time to blend the food, that blender it's not too sharp, i have to wait 20 to 30 minutes

Author: peggyb
Title: Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Multi-Function Blender
Body: Opened the box, took out the blender and the first thing I noticed was that the gears were made of plastic. I knew that this wouldn't last long so I immediately sent it back.

Author: gracie
Title: So far so good
Body: I have only had this about 1 week. I use it to crush ice. I have Sjogren's Syndrome and need to keep water or ice with me at all times. so far this blender is working just fine, but I have a feeling it might not stand up to the pressure of crushing ice several times per day. For now all is great, only time will tell if it will last. I do recommend this Seller and the blender, it is a great little blender so far!

Author: Kari L.
Title: Definitely recommend.
Body: So many blenders to choose from and so many contradicting reviews. Ended up going with Hamilton Beach as I have always had good luck with their products. My primary reason for purchasing this was to replace eggs/toast or cereal in the morning with healthy fruit smoothies. I couldnt be happier with this choice/purchase. The blending container is glass, which I like as it is solid and sturdy. There are multiple blending, chopping, grinding options for any type of mixing. I have only used the smoothie button so cannot comment on how the others do. Each and every smoothie has come out perfect. Not a nugget of ice or chunk of unblended fruit. Perfectly delicious everytime! Now, the downside...and its small...is that the lid is a bit difficult to get off. I love this product enough that the lid issue is not worth removing a star but for someone older or a senior, who may not have upper body strength, they may struggle a bit. Otherwise, HIGHLY recommend.

Author: finessa Wright
Title: Hamilton Beach wave
Body: Didn't have it long, didn't use it much and it already burned up. I wasted my money. Don't waste yours.

Author: Alex
Title: Good and affordable blender
Body: This is definitely a great blender for a decent price. We mainly use it for smoothies or to puree soups. It takes a few seconds for the wave action to occur, so sometimes it seems as if ingredients on the top will not be mixed in, but once the wave function starts up, everything is blended quite well.

Author: the plodding chef
Title: great purchase
Body: this not only looks good,it works!blends and mixes quickly,completely and quietly.ice crushing is dependent on size of cubes and liquid.i've no complaints,best blender for the price.

Author: Marjamina752
Title: works well, but haven't put it to any strenuous test.
Body: This looks nice and works fine. I have not put it to any strenuous test by chopping hard veggies like carrots.

Author: Donna
Title: Wonderful!
Body: Had a very expensive Kitchen Aid Blender for 15 years and it was a pain to clean and you could not pour anything without spilling it. I LOVE this Blender. It is so powerful. Makes the best smoothies ; easy to pour; easy to clean. Best money ever spent and it cost a third of the Kitchen Aids.

Author: Hammerklavier
Title: It's OK
Body: The blender looks neither great nor terrible, and that pretty much sums up every aspect of this blender.It blends fairly well, although you'll have to use a pair of chopsticks etc to push around larger chunks of ice or fruit if they are not getting down to the blades. It's handled tasks fairly well -- sometimes it starts to emit a burning smell if I lay on the high power pulse button for more than a few seconds. I wouldn't push it too hard.All in all, for the price, I'm happy with this purchase.

Author: Marina
Title: Does the job and makes great smoothies!
Body: I needed to get a decent blender for making smoothies until I can afford a Vitamix, and I chose this one because it appeared to have the highest wattage in its price range, and the reviews were all fairly solid. I was under the impression that I was getting a blender in the $80 - $100 range for $30 based on the reviews and specs, so I was excited to receive it. Sure enough, it is a pretty solid blender - the pitcher is made of glass and is heavy, which I don't mind because that to me means quality. The design is stylish, and the performance is satisfactory. You still have to pick up the pitcher and shake it sometimes when making smoothies, but it does crush the ice well if you add enough liquid (I use light vanilla Silk in mine). I usually let it run for about 30 - 45 seconds to make sure all the ice and nuts get blended. All in all happy with the performance.To address the lid issue - yes, it is kind of a pain to remove it sometimes, but it does get worn in and become easier to open with time. Also, I don't try to remove it by the pull tab, instead I make a hook with my finger and remove it from below the tab where the lid and glass meet.

Author: Lauren Nicole
Title: Works well for the price!
Body: I'm giving it five stars because of how well it works for the price I bought it at. When I make smoothies with ice in then, sometimes I have to mix it more then expected, but it works efficiently. (:* Doesn't give instructions on how to take it apart

Author: John L.
Title: Great blender at a great price
Body: We have had this blender for several months now and use it almost daily. Good power, quiet mottor, and it seems as if it will hold up. Recommend!

Author: Nic Jac
Title: Doesn't crush as great as I thought it would
Body: It's okay, it stops blending/crushing ice a lot and I have to mix things around to get it going again. I was expecting the motor/blades to be stronger.

Author: juli
Title: small everyday blender fine-need more power for a party!
Body: this is a small blender for SMALL jobs. pulsing and blending smoothies are fine. tried to make drinks with crushed ice and was not successful. overall it's ok but defenitly not good for a party of 4 or more.

Author: B. Warmus
Title: Love It!
Body: I used this today to puree some squash for a soup I was making. It really pureed it real good. My other one still left chunks no matter how long I tried. I read the reviews on this one and bought it. I really love it all the buttons for different pulses.It was packed real good and came in excellent condition

Author: East meets west
Title: It works great and great price too!
Body: Since we got it we make morning smoothies almost every day. I like that you don't have to twist it onto the base. It makes it so easy. And i like that it's glass, not plastic. The top does fit snugly but you learn how to take it off, not a big deal for me. We've had it over a month now and are very happy we bought it.

Author: Diana
Title: Works great
Body: I was a little afraid that this blender will not last more than a few uses but so far so good. I make a new juice every 3 days and i have tried blending anything from ice, apples, beets and soft fruit and the Hamilton is doing it's job right. I still feel the smell of a new engine every time I blend so I don't have it on for more than 10 seconds. Two or three rounds of 10 seconds are enough to blend everything. For the price it is a great purchase....I hope it will last. Cleaning is very easy

Author: Ozzy
Title: Long lasting and very dependable
Body: I bought this item here on Amazon on April 16th 2013. Now that plenty of time has passed I feel like I can give it a honest review. This is an excellent blender and very durable. My wife and I used it every day to make our morning shakes. The only knock I have to give it is that I wish the motor was a bit more powerful. I'm not say this can't get the job done because it can, I just think it could use a little more power. I have made everything in this. The date today as I write this is May 10th 2016 and my blender is still working as well as the day I took it out of the box. I highly recommend it to everyone.

Author: JOSELIN RODRIGUEZ
Title: very good
Body: great blender. it is very powerful and look nice. i got it because of the way it look and that it match my kitchen

Author: Chocoamust
Title: Best Blender I've Owned
Body: I love this blender. I use it often and haven't found one thing to dislike. At this point I would not hesitate to recommend this blender.

Author: Autumn
Title: I got a defect item
Body: I was so excited about getting the blender ,but as soon as I opened the box,I found some plastic chip.The underneath is chipping that it was dropped ,but no damage on the box.I had to return it since some of chip remain IN the machine.It seems really bad idea to buy an appliance....

Author: H Highto
Title: Does the job
Body: Perfect for my morning smoothies, blending two frozen bananas well. A few times I had to move the ingredients around with a spoon, but I think that was impatience on my part. The spout on the lid is great.

Author: Ddveshka
Title: Working as expected
Body: I have been using this product for a couple of weeks and I am pretty satisfied. I am glad I don't have to hold the cup when in operation because it sits very well in the cradle. The cup is made of solid glass that is easy to wash and feels very durable. Some blenders smell burnt plastic but I couldn't smell any noticeable odor from this one so far.

Author: C Moore
Title: Not Quite Up To Expectations
Body: I bought this blender to replace my Hamilton Beach blender that I received as a wedding present 13 years ago. I mainly do smoothies and often using frozen kale. This blender, though touted as a smoothie kind of blender, does not puree the kale. It leaves bigger unappetizing pieces. I am still working on the right amounts of fruit and veggie and ice and water/juice to make it work. If I ever get it to I can update here!For some reason my old HB blender worked beautifully in this way. I assumed that a new and improved version would work as well. Too bad! It is quite difficult to choose a blender from reviews, apparently! Good Luck to all of you who are shopping.

Author: PAQ
Title: Very sufficient
Body: I have had this blender for about a month now, and I use it ALMOST every day. I wanted something that would blend my frozen breakfast smoothies, and maybe some fruity, frozen drinks this summer. Works fabulous for the smoothies!I also just recently discovered the Pioneer Woman's salsa recipe, and I only have a 2 cup food processor, so I tried throwing everything in the blender. Again, works fabulous! It is not QUITE large enough to do the whole recipe, but there's just my husband and me, so I make 1/2 of the recipe, and this jar is perfect.I only took off a star because the lid is so darn hard to get on and off. I realize you want a nice tight fit, but I seriously struggle to get the lid on/off. I have learned to use the pour spout when they are thin enough to actually pour, but some mornings I make them a little thicker (they last longer that way) and I need the lid to come off.But if you're just looking for a sufficient blender to mix some frozen drinks, this one definitely fits!!

Author: mcpris214
Title: Pretty nice!
Body: I bought this after several hours of researching the best inexpensive blender online. I used it for the first time this morning and am not disappointed! The old blender I have doesn't work for smoothies at all. The blades spin and nothing gets blended. This one is different. I put it in with my frozen fruit, yogurt, milk, etc and it blended nicely. I did have to go in the jar and mix it with a spoon a couple of times to encourage the blending (not while it was on!) and it came out smooth as silk with absolutely NO fruit chunks. Very delicious with great texture. For the price I think it's a great deal. Glass jar, great looking appliance for your counter space and works great. Definitely would recommend!

Author: cmiller
Title: Hamilton Wave crusher blender
Body: This is a very good product, excellent price and the product works exactly as described, a very very good product, would recommend buying.

Author: Mheg
Title: Button control problems
Body: Plus 1 star for the glass jar, Plus 1 star for the overall look from afar.Minus 1star for the noise. Minus 2 stars for the button controls that are wobbly and unevenly placed.Had to return the item.Too bad, because I really like the width of the jar.Not sure if the issue on button controls applies to all its stocks, but we'll not get a replacement as we don't want to take the risk.

Author: Luna
Title: Surprisingly Pleased!
Body: I love this blender because it is budget friendly and it gets the job done. My boyfriend and I have been going back and forth between buying a Blendtec or not for the past month. Eventually, I just decided to take a risk and buy this inexpensive blender and give it a try. To our surprise, it worked out well. We’ve had it for about 10 days now and we’ve made so many smoothies. I like that it is easy to clean and there is a smoothie button, which is my personal favorite ☺ The spout on the lid is a very neat feature and I love the overall look of the blender. Now the power cord is kind of short and the lid is kind of hard to remove but with some patience it’s not a big deal to us. Overall, we are very pleased and happy that we saved some money!

Author: Erica
Title: Housewarming Gift
Body: The lady that I purchased the blender for said she absolutely loves it! It looks great in her black and stainless steel kitchen.

Author: JBVH
Title: Great for green smoothies
Body: This blender quickly turns a container full of greens (kale, chard, watercress), ice, and fruit into a smooth drink, and it's a fraction of the cost of the blenders that are usually recommended for green smoothies. It also does a great job making nut milks and cashew cream.

Author: DynoShip
Title: Nice features, convenient design, fast too!
Body: I've looked hard to find something wrong with this. I've never cared for push-button controls on many blenders. But I do like the wide speed range this blender offers. It is quite fast and not obnoxiously noisy.Our old one (Back to Basics) cost $15 more and offered a side spout for pouring. Of course, after pouring you still had to remove the jar to pour what remained at the bottom below the spout. But the jar was easier to handle since it weighed a lot less with most of the liquid poured out already.But I like this one better, because it pours so nicely with hardly a drip to clean up. Plus, the blades do such a great job there essentially no residue at the bottom after everything is poured out. That was not true with our old one which would routinely leave a few small chunks of fruit at the bottom, plus you had to take apart the side spout to clean it also.It lasted almost 7 years, so can't complain.But the Crusher does a very good job plus has a few extra features that make it very useful, practical and easy to clean. Great value at this price!

Author: Anand Dalli
Title: I think I was cheated and given a used product when I ordered for a new one.
Body: I ordered a new Hamilton Beach Wave Crusher Multi Function Blender.However, There are scratches all over the body of the machine and also the buttons are erratic.Some buttons are easy and some buttons are very hard.You press one button and two of them get clicked.Pathetic Serice, I would never recommend buying it to anyone.

Author: Teddy Bear
Title: A nice blender
Body: This blender is nice looking, appears to be sturdy, and functions well. I like the idea of a glass container, even thought it's a bit heavy. The lid is hard to get on and off, but maybe it will loosen up with time.

Author: 3doggos
Title: Great blender for a great price!
Body: I was looking for a good/cheap blender for smoothie making. My last one could barely handle frozen fruit without having a heart attack. This this is great, and super efficient! Love it.

Author: Cindy And Bruce
Title: Love this Heavy Duty Blender
Body: I had read good reviews for this blender, and when I receivedit I was just as happy with it. Its heavy duty glass and a strongmotor. I received a personal blender for Christmas and the motorburned out already!! I love this blender, I can throw in ice cubes,frozen fruit and it has no trouble. Love it! You will too!

Author: Lovely7
Title: Love it! Worth it
Body: This blender is great! I use it to make drinks to be able to get my mass gainer down. It is fast and my favorite part is that clean up is easy.

Author: 2MuchTime
Title: Rated at 3.5A on the base but claims to be 700 w but a good blender for the price.
Body: At 120 volts 3.5 A is 420 watts not 700. The blender seems fine but it is not 700 watts as claimed. (2 Stars)Update: After using it for a few days I am not as upset about being lied to about the power. It so much quieter than my old blender, a blendtec and every blender they had at home depot. The lid is hard to get off which lead to one of my smoothies ending up on the floor so now I used the little pour spout and take the lip off when it is empty. In all I got a blender that does what I need (reasonably quiet and will make a smoothie) and did not have to pay $400+ for a variable speed vitamix (which on low speed is the only blender I have ever used that might not wake up your room mates or even worse your neighbors.)

Author: Trish
Title: love it
Body: surprized it had a glass mixer, very nice. don't really have 9 more words to add to this it's good

Author: Linlan
Title: excellent blender!
Body: This blender is powerful and does what it promises. It blends everything, smoothies turn out beautifully. Overall awesome blender at an excellent price. You have to buy this!

Author: Maryjane
Title: Love It!
Body: So far I've made frozen white russians, milk shakes, frappacinos, lasagna sauce and mole sauce. This blender performs GREAT with everything. Chops ice, blends, purees, I really don't know what else anyone wants from a blender. It is not loud, my old blender was at least three times louder. It has plenty of power. It is a beautiful appliance to the eye as well. The only thing I had trouble with was the lid. I had a problem taking the lid off the first few times I used it, but it loosened up slightly with use and is now easier to take off. I guess it's a good thing to have a snug fitting lid on a blender anyway. Yeah, I think this blender is well worth the $30 I paid.

Author: Sarah
Title: Gets the job done
Body: This gets the job done. I make green smoothies every morning and this has enough power for carrots, frozen fruit, and ice. It is loud but you need the power. I have found that I need to let it do its thing and wait for the wave action instead of pulling it off to early.

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Better than some of the more expensive ones
Body: This blender works well, and is really easy to clean. I have gone through several different brands and blenders in the past, and this one is my favorite so far. It does seem to take a little longer to blend things than some of the other ones, and if you don't have it tightened enough on the bottom it leaks a little, but other than that it is fantastic, and the leaking isn't so bad that it hinders it's use. I would recommend it.

Author: Diane Malley
Title: Work s great
Body: not quite an ice crusher, but does as expected for what a good blender should do plus it is easy to clean.

Author: S. Qassis
Title: Powerful and Easy to Clean
Body: I have purchased this to make my protein shakes in the morning and so far I am very satisfied. I use about 4 cubes of ice along with chunky peanut butter and this blender makes quick work of all the chunks into a smooth cold shake. I'm probably ordering another one for my parents soon so they can enjoy the same luxury as i am. Also the glass jar is a must as it is very easy to clean and wont hold in the smell of the protein and milk.

Author: Alberto
Title: Licuadora
Body: No licua bien. Deja las coasas martajadas

Author: Esmeralda
Title: Leer Atentamente
Body: Considero que la licuadora estuvo bien, solo que me ubiese gustado que la base del motor fuera más gruesa y en ves de plástico ubiese sido metal, en mi persona sigue al frente Oster con las licuadoras comunes de una velocidad.

Title: Buena
Body: Esta bien la licuadora solo le falta un poco de potencia pero me ha servido bien para mis necesidades.

Body: So I open the box, take all the pieces out and ugg its only two cups...way too small but not the sellers fault, my fault for looking at the aesthetics...but one flaw in the design is that the top fits on and you really have to push it on hard...I ended up giving it to a friend rather than returning it because it was my error nothing wrong with it...it does look sharp though...

Body: El material y el diseño bien, pero los alimentos no licua por completo.

Author: Sarah S
Title: Not worth it
Body: This blender is very bad at blending smoothies and don’t ever think about blending anything thicker then that. We needed a blender in a pinch so I read the mostly positive reviews but not even a year later I’m tired of it taking 5 minutes to blend a smoothie even after adding so much liquid it doubles the recipe. You are better off with any other blender.

And I like that it’s really easy to clean once you just take it apart in pieces, which I didn’t realize until just recently.

Author: Cold

Body: Great blender, and great value. Use it to make smoothies with frozen fruits and it mixes everything quite well without any large chunks. It's best to use the lower setting mixer to help break down frozen items before blending on a higher setting.

Author: Shaunna
Title: lid doesnt side corretly
Body: Love this blender however the lid doest sit quite properly on the top otherwise is great

Author: Amazon Customer
Title: Plastic on base very flimsy cracked immediately
Body: I purchased this Hamilton Beach blender Mar. 19/21. I bought it because I owned a similar Hamilton Beach blender for years without any real problems and I wanted a glass carafe. When I ordered and received the blender I noticed the design was different, it seemed less sturdy, the plastic parts were flimsy, buttons that used to be flush against the blender now awkwardly stuck up from the blender, instead of the blender sitting on top of the motor it sat into it, it was loud and there was a slight rubber burning smell when I used it. I used the blender a handful of times, taking it apart to clean it and reassemble it every time. About 2 weeks into having it as I’m putting the blade back into the carafe and screwing the base on the bottom of the carafe I hear a click. Thinking nothing of it I put the carafe on the blender and blend my drink. Right away I notice liquid leaking from the bottom. I take the blender apart and see that the plastic base that screws onto the carafe has cracked. I email Hamilton Beach for a replacement part and they respond stating that they normally don’t cover the cost of shipping but will waive the cost of shipping this one time. I received my replacement part and used my blender a total of 2 times before the same thing happened again. I was screwing the base onto the bottom of the carafe and heard a click. I used the blender and liquid leaked out the bottom. Needless to say I’m not contacting Hamilton Beach for another replacement. This is a design flaw, the plastic on the base is very flimsy. Thankfully, Amazon has agreed to refund me the $.

Title: Garbage
Body: Cheap, plastic piece of crap. Doesn't grind food well. Weak motor. Buy anything else but not this. Worst product I've ever bought on Amazon.

Body:
The media could not be loaded.

Is so stupid to take off, it is really hard and I can see the edges getting bent and then not sealing properly because this lid is soft plastic!! Cleaning it is especially annoying.

Everything was all scratched up and a small nick near the blade inside. Not sure if it was used or just one that was mishandled but I returned it. Better quality control would solve this issue. I hate returning things it’s such a hassle but I couldn’t get over the fact that it could be used.

Body: Excellent blender, great tight fitting lid. The easy opening pour for the lid is a bonus. My only complaint is the glass jug is quite heavy and I don't think the lid is dishwasher safe. Besides that, Great for our morning smoothies.

Author: Unlucky Seven
Title: Huge value, cost shows in materials.
Body: Overall very happy with this, have already made plenty smoothies. I could see how it’d crack If you cycle hot water into this after cold, plastic base is a bit thinner and lighter plastic than it could be but with care should last all the same. Just has the same “magic bullet” style rubber spinner that could get worn with careless use.Easy to clean, just need a longer brush. The lid itself is odd there’s a small plastic flap that opens for pouring but it’s not all too secure I could see it snapping off as well, again the lid being plastic if the cheaper variety.Good for general use, maybe not a forever appliance. Will replace when I move.

Author: eZ
Title: Good value for money
Body: OK if you are not a pro who makes almond milk etc at home, this is your product. Well it takes a while for it to blend ice but at the end it does, and having worked for a big competitor company specializing on power blenders, I personally think you do not need those high end super powerful blenders - this is enough to make all types of smoothies and coctails!

Author: Jason Dee
Title: It's fine for a temp, not sure why all the high reviews
Body: First off it's way smaller than I thought. That's on me, I should've done better research. Best fit would be a blender for one unless you both have really small drinks. It does suck down towards the blade, as long as it's not thick. My mixture with spinach, yogurt and frozen fruits would just hang there, I would have to open it open and get it moving again myself with a spoon. Same thing with the easy pour lid. If it's a thick smoothie, you're going to have a mess. By the time I tipped it enough to get it to come out, it was leaking out the original spout as well. It also sounds right out of the box like the blades need oil, it's like nails on a chalkboard. It will do for now, but I can't wait to replace it. If it's for a single person and your like your smoothies thin like juice and prepare it to be that way you should be fine. Otherwise I would steer clear.

Author: Ed
Title: 10 Stars...
Body: WoW!! First, it arrived in less than 2 days. This blender is Amazing, it does it all and the pitcher is made of GLASS, no poisonous plastic to enter your body. Super easy to clean (even has a self cleaning button) and the price is fantastic for what you are getting, unbelievable. I am so happy with this purchase. Love the design and looks really great!

Author: EfrainWarped
Title: La licuadora bien ..... pero el SERVICIO de entrega AMZMX muy irresponsables
Body: El producto esta bien .... a pesar de que los que entregaron el paquete aventaron la caja sobre una barda de 2.20 metros de alto desde afuera de mi casa. UN intento y no encontraron a nadie. Ingrese al sitio web para dar instrucción que dejaran la caja con un vecino. Pero en el segundo intento, al no encontrar a nadie, decidieron deshacerse del paquete arriesgando el contenido. Eso es muy IRRESPONSABLE! La licuadora funciona bien. Pero no deberían poner en riesgo la integridad del contenido de es amanera tan descuidada.

Author: Vic Luna
Title: Justo como en la foto.
Body: Excelente producto; el servicio de Amazon fue excelente (8 días), sobre la licuadora; la potencia es adecuada, el diseño es bonito y moderno, el vaso es resistente y la boquilla que tiene en la tapa la vuelve muy versátil. Lo único que me gustaría que fuese diferente es el tamaño del vaso, aunque concuerda con el tamaño anunciado en la publicidad. Muy recomendable.Actualizacion del review: a poco menos de un mes de comprarla y despues del uso cotidiano me doy cuenta que le hace falta un poco de potencia y que las letras de los botones se han borrado con demasiada facilidad. Aun asi, el precio es competitivo y el producto es de buena calidad.
